AI & Computational Biology.title: Comprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09850-xComprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Echocardiography is the most widely used cardiac imaging modality, capturing ultrasound video data to assess cardiac structure and function1. Artificial intelligence (AI) in echocardiography has the potential to streamline manual tasks and improve reproducibility and precision2. However, most echocardiography AI models are single-view, single-task systems that do not synthesize complementary information from multiple views captured during a full exam3,4, and thus lead to limited performance and scope of applications. To address this problem, we introduce EchoPrime, a multi-view, view-informed, video-based vision-language foundation model trained on over 12 million video-report pairs. EchoPrime uses contrastive learning to train a unified embedding model for all standard views in a comprehensive echocardiogram study with representation of both rare and common diseases and diagnoses. EchoPrime then utilizes view-classification and a view-informed anatomic attention module to weight video-specific embeddings that accurately map the relationship between echocardiographic views and anatomical structures. With retrieval-augmented interpretation, EchoPrime integrates information from all echocardiogram videos in a comprehensive study and performs holistic clinical interpretation. In datasets from five international independent healthcare systems, EchoPrime achieves state-of-the art performance on 23 diverse benchmarks of cardiac form and function, surpassing the performance of both task-specific approaches and prior foundation models. Following rigorous clinical evaluation, EchoPrime can assist physicians in the automated preliminary assessment of comprehensive echocardiography.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 基于视图引导视觉语言AI的综合超声心动图评估
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 超声心动图是应用最广泛的心脏影像学检查方法，通过捕获超声视频数据来评估心脏结构和功能1。人工智能（AI）在超声心动图领域的应用，有望简化人工操作，提高检查的重现性和精确性2。然而，大多数超声心动图AI模型是单视图、单任务系统，无法综合利用完整检查过程中捕获的多个视图的互补信息3,4，从而导致其性能和应用范围受限。为解决此问题，我们引入了EchoPrime，这是一个多视图、视图引导、基于视频的视觉语言基础模型，其训练数据超过1200万个视频-报告对。EchoPrime利用对比学习，为综合超声心动图研究中的所有标准视图训练了一个统一的嵌入模型，该模型能够表征罕见和常见疾病及诊断。EchoPrime随后利用视图分类和视图引导的解剖学注意力模块，对视频特异性嵌入进行加权，从而精确映射超声心动图视图与解剖结构之间的关系。通过检索增强型解释，EchoPrime整合了综合研究中所有超声心动图视频的信息，并进行整体临床解读。在来自五个国际独立医疗系统的数据集中，EchoPrime在23个不同的心脏形态和功能基准测试中取得了最先进的性能，超越了任务特异性方法和现有基础模型的表现。经过严格的临床评估，EchoPrime能够辅助医生对综合超声心动图进行自动化初步评估。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Multimodal learning enables chat-based exploration of single-cell data
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02857-9CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Single-cell sequencing characterizes biological samples at unprecedented scale and detail, but data interpretation remains challenging. Here, we present CellWhisperer, an artificial intelligence (AI) model and software tool for chat-based interrogation of gene expression. We establish a multimodal embedding of transcriptomes and their textual annotations, using contrastive learning on 1 million RNA sequencing profiles with AI-curated descriptions. This embedding informs a large language model that answers user-provided questions about cells and genes in natural-language chats. We benchmark CellWhisperer’s performance for zero-shot prediction of cell types and other biological annotations and demonstrate its use for biological discovery in a meta-analysis of human embryonic development. We integrate a CellWhisperer chat box with the CELLxGENE browser, allowing users to interactively explore gene expression through a combined graphical and chat interface. In summary, CellWhisperer leverages large community-scale data repositories to connect transcriptomes and text, thereby enabling interactive exploration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data with natural-language chats. CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 多模态学习赋能单细胞数据的对话式探索
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 单细胞测序以前所未有的规模和细节表征生物样本，但数据解读仍然充满挑战。在此，我们介绍CellWhisperer，这是一种用于基因表达对话式查询的人工智能（AI）模型和软件工具。我们利用对比学习，基于100万个带有AI策展描述的RNA测序图谱，建立了转录组及其文本注释的多模态嵌入。该嵌入为大型语言模型提供信息，使其能够以自然语言对话的形式回答用户提出的关于细胞和基因的问题。我们对CellWhisperer在细胞类型和其他生物学注释的零样本预测性能进行了基准测试，并展示了其在人类胚胎发育元分析中进行生物学发现的应用。我们将CellWhisperer聊天框与CELLxGENE浏览器集成，使用户能够通过图形和聊天相结合的界面交互式探索基因表达。总之，CellWhisperer利用大型社区规模的数据存储库连接转录组和文本，从而通过自然语言对话实现单细胞RNA测序数据的交互式探索。CellWhisperer利用转录组和文本的多模态学习来回答有关单细胞RNA测序数据的问题。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Zero-shot segmentation using embeddings from a protein language model identifies functional regions in the human proteome
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Ami G. Sangster, Cameron Dufault, Haoning Qu, Denise Le, Julie D. Forman-Kay, Alan M. MosesThe biological function of a protein is often determined by its distinct functional units, such as folded domains and intrinsically disordered regions. Identifying and categorizing these protein segments from sequence has been a major focus in computational biology which has enabled the automatic annotation of folded protein domains. Here we show that embeddings from the unsupervised protein language model ProtT5 can be used to identify and categorize protein segments without relying on conserved patterns in primary amino acid sequence. We present Zero-shot Protein Segmentation (ZPS), where we use embeddings from ProtT5 to predict the boundaries of protein segments without training or fine-tuning any parameters. We find that ZPS boundary predictions for the human proteome are better at reproducing reviewed annotations from UniProt than established bioinformatics tools and ProtT5 embeddings of ZPS segments can categorize over 200 of the most common UniProt annotations in the human proteome, including folded domains, sub-domains, and intrinsically disordered regions. To explore ZPS predictions, we introduce a new way to visualize protein embeddings that closely resembles diagrams of distinct functional units in protein biology. Since ZPS and segment embeddings can be used without training or fine-tuning, the approach is not biased towards known annotations and can be used to identify and categorize unannotated protein segments. We used the segment embeddings to identify unannotated mitochondrion targeting signals and SYGQ-rich prion-like domains, which are functional regions within intrinsically disordered regions. We expect that the analysis of protein segment embedding similarity can lead to valuable information about protein function, including about intrinsically disordered regions and poorly understood protein regions.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 利用蛋白质语言模型嵌入的零样本分割识别人类蛋白质组中的功能区域
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 蛋白质的生物学功能通常由其独特的结构单元决定，例如折叠结构域和内在无序区域。从序列中识别和分类这些蛋白质片段一直是计算生物学的一个主要焦点，这使得折叠蛋白质结构域的自动注释成为可能。在此，我们展示了来自无监督蛋白质语言模型ProtT5的嵌入可以用于识别和分类蛋白质片段，而无需依赖一级氨基酸序列中的保守模式。我们提出了零样本蛋白质分割（ZPS）方法，该方法利用ProtT5的嵌入来预测蛋白质片段的边界，无需进行任何参数的训练或微调。我们发现，ZPS对人类蛋白质组的边界预测在重现UniProt中经过评审的注释方面优于已有的生物信息学工具，并且ZPS片段的ProtT5嵌入可以对人类蛋白质组中200多种最常见的UniProt注释进行分类，包括折叠结构域、亚结构域和内在无序区域。为了探索ZPS的预测结果，我们引入了一种新的蛋白质嵌入可视化方法，该方法与蛋白质生物学中独特的结构单元图示非常相似。由于ZPS和片段嵌入无需训练或微调即可使用，因此该方法不会偏向于已知注释，并且可用于识别和分类未注释的蛋白质片段。我们利用这些片段嵌入识别了未注释的线粒体靶向信号和富含SYGQ的朊病毒样结构域，这些都是内在无序区域内的功能区域。我们预计，蛋白质片段嵌入相似性的分析可以为蛋白质功能提供有价值的信息，包括内在无序区域和了解不足的蛋白质区域。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Computationally efficient meta-analysis of gene-based tests using summary statistics in large-scale genetic studies
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02390-0REMETA is a method for meta-analyzing gene-based associations using summary statistics, integrating with REGENIE and improving computational efficiency for large studies with many phenotypes.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Meta-analysis of gene-based tests using single-variant summary statistics is a powerful strategy for genetic association studies. However, current approaches require sharing the covariance matrix between variants for each study and trait of interest. For large-scale studies with many phenotypes, these matrices can be cumbersome to calculate, store and share. Here, to address this challenge, we present REMETA—an efficient tool for meta-analysis of gene-based tests. REMETA uses a single sparse covariance reference file per study that is rescaled for each phenotype using single-variant summary statistics. We develop new methods for binary traits with case–control imbalance, and to estimate allele frequencies, genotype counts and effect sizes of burden tests. We demonstrate the performance and advantages of our approach through meta-analysis of five traits in 469,376 samples in UK Biobank. The open-source REMETA software will facilitate meta-analysis across large-scale exome sequencing studies from diverse studies that cannot easily be combined. REMETA is a method for meta-analyzing gene-based associations using summary statistics, integrating with REGENIE and improving computational efficiency for large studies with many phenotypes.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 大规模遗传学研究中利用汇总统计数据进行基因水平检验的计算高效荟萃分析
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 利用单变异汇总统计数据进行基因水平检验的荟萃分析是遗传关联研究的有力策略。然而，当前方法要求针对每个研究和感兴趣的性状共享变异之间的协方差矩阵。对于具有众多表型的大规模研究，这些矩阵的计算、存储和共享可能非常繁琐。为应对这一挑战，我们在此提出REMETA——一个用于基因水平检验荟萃分析的高效工具。REMETA为每个研究使用一个稀疏协方差参考文件，该文件利用单变异汇总统计数据针对每个表型进行重新缩放。我们开发了针对病例-对照不平衡的二分类性状的新方法，并用于估计等位基因频率、基因型计数和负担检验的效应大小。我们通过对英国生物样本库中469,376个样本的五种性状进行荟萃分析，展示了我们方法的性能和优势。开源的REMETA软件将促进来自难以轻易整合的各种研究的大规模外显子组测序研究的荟萃分析。REMETA是一种利用汇总统计数据进行基因水平关联荟萃分析的方法，它与REGENIE集成，并提高了具有众多表型的大规模研究的计算效率。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Universal consensus 3D segmentation of cells from 2D segmented stacks
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02887-wu-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Cell segmentation is the foundation of a wide range of microscopy-based biological studies. Deep learning has revolutionized two-dimensional (2D) cell segmentation, enabling generalized solutions across cell types and imaging modalities. This has been driven by the ease of scaling up image acquisition, annotation and computation. However, three-dimensional (3D) cell segmentation, requiring dense annotation of 2D slices, still poses substantial challenges. Manual labeling of 3D cells to train broadly applicable segmentation models is prohibitive. Even in high-contrast images annotation is ambiguous and time-consuming. Here we develop a theory and toolbox, u-Segment3D, for 2D-to-3D segmentation, compatible with any 2D method generating pixel-based instance cell masks. u-Segment3D translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data, as demonstrated on 11 real-life datasets, comprising >70,000 cells, spanning single cells, cell aggregates and tissue. Moreover, u-Segment3D is competitive with native 3D segmentation, even exceeding when cells are crowded and have complex morphologies. u-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 基于二维分割堆栈的细胞通用共识三维分割
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 细胞分割是广泛显微镜生物学研究的基础。深度学习彻底改变了二维（2D）细胞分割，实现了跨细胞类型和成像模式的通用解决方案。这得益于图像采集、标注和计算的规模化便利性。然而，三维（3D）细胞分割需要对2D切片进行密集标注，这仍然带来了巨大的挑战。手动标注3D细胞以训练广泛适用的分割模型是难以承受的。即使在高对比度图像中，标注也模糊不清且耗时。在此，我们开发了一种理论和工具箱u-Segment3D，用于2D到3D的分割，它兼容任何生成基于像素的实例细胞掩膜的2D方法。u-Segment3D无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割，这已在11个真实数据集（包含超过70,000个细胞，涵盖单细胞、细胞聚集体和组织）上得到验证。此外，u-Segment3D与原生3D分割方法相比具有竞争力，甚至在细胞拥挤且形态复杂时表现更优。u-Segment3D是一个通用框架，无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割。它在包括形态复杂细胞在内的各种数据集中表现良好。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Digital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
AI & Computational Biology.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00596-wDigital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: The development of effective interventions for neurodegenerative disorders, such as posterior cortical atrophy (a visual Alzheimer’s variant), remains to be a significant clinical challenge. We introduce a computational framework using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as in silico models to simulate visual system degeneration and evaluate intervention strategies. By modeling controlled synaptic decay and comparing three distinct retraining approaches, random data (control), accuracy-based, and entropy-based, we assess impacts on classification performance and neural representation geometry. Our results demonstrate that accuracy-based retraining outperformed other strategies, maintaining model performance and preserving optimal manifold geometry during intermediate degeneration stages. This computational analysis supports prioritizing accuracy-targeted interventions for cognitive compensation. Our framework enables rapid evaluation of intervention efficacy while elucidating computational principles underlying neurodegeneration and recovery. This approach offers a platform for refining strategies to slow visual-cognitive decline in neurodegenerative diseases, bridging mechanistic insights with clinical translation.
AI & Computational Biology.authors_short: Moore, Jasmine A. et al., Forkert, Nils D.
AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 数字模拟痴呆与退化神经网络认知干预策略的评估
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 神经退行性疾病（如后皮层萎缩，一种视觉型阿尔茨海默病变体）有效干预措施的开发，仍然是一个重大的临床挑战。我们引入了一个计算框架，该框架利用卷积神经网络（CNNs）作为计算机模拟模型，以模拟视觉系统退化并评估干预策略。通过模拟受控的突触衰减，并比较三种不同的再训练方法——随机数据（对照）、基于准确性以及基于熵的方法，我们评估了它们对分类性能和神经表征几何结构的影响。我们的结果表明，在中间退化阶段，基于准确性的再训练优于其他策略，能够保持模型性能并保留最佳流形几何结构。这项计算分析支持优先采用以准确性为目标的干预措施进行认知补偿。我们的框架能够快速评估干预措施的有效性，同时阐明神经退行性变和恢复背后的计算原理。这种方法为完善减缓神经退行性疾病中视觉-认知衰退的策略提供了一个平台，将机制洞察与临床转化相结合。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Automated C. elegans behavior analysis via deep learning-based detection and tracking
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Xiaoke Liu, Jianming Liu, Wenjie Teng, Yuzhong Peng, Boao Li, Xiaoqing Han, Jing HuoAs a well-established and extensively utilized model organism, Caenorhabditis elegans (C. elegans) serves as a crucial platform for investigating behavioral regulation mechanisms and their biological significance. However, manually tracking the locomotor behavior of large numbers of C. elegans is both cumbersome and inefficient. To address the above challenges, we innovatively propose an automated approach for analyzing C. elegans behavior through deep learning-based detection and tracking. Building upon existing research, we developed an enhanced worm detection framework that integrates YOLOv8 with ByteTrack, enabling real-time, precise tracking of multiple worms. Based on the tracking results, we further established an automated high-throughput method for quantitative analysis of multiple movement parameters, including locomotion velocity, body bending angle, and roll frequency, thereby laying a robust foundation for high-precision, automated analysis of complex worm behaviors. including movement speed, body bending angle, and roll frequency, thereby laying a robust foundation for high-precision, automated analysis of complex worm behaviors. Comparative evaluations demonstrate that the proposed enhanced C. elegans detection framework outperforms existing methods, achieving a precision of 99.5%, recall of 98.7%, and mAP50 of 99.6%, with a processing speed of 153 frames per second (FPS). The established framework for worm detection, tracking, and automated behavioral analysis developed in this study delivers superior detection and tracking accuracy while enhancing tracking continuity and robustness. Unlike traditional labor-intensive measurement approaches, our framework supports simultaneous tracking of multiple worms while maintaining automated extraction of various behavioral parameters with high precision. Furthermore, our approach advances the standardization of C. elegans behavioral parameter analysis, which can analyze the behavioral data of multiple worms at the same time, significantly improving the experimental throughput and providing an efficient tool for drug screening, gene function research and other fields.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 基于深度学习检测与追踪的秀丽隐杆线虫自动化行为分析
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 秀丽隐杆线虫（C. elegans）作为一种成熟且广泛使用的模式生物，是研究行为调控机制及其生物学意义的重要平台。然而，人工追踪大量秀丽隐杆线虫的运动行为既繁琐又低效。为应对上述挑战，我们创新性地提出了一种基于深度学习检测与追踪的秀丽隐杆线虫自动化行为分析方法。在现有研究的基础上，我们开发了一个增强型线虫检测框架，该框架将YOLOv8与ByteTrack相结合，实现了对多条线虫的实时精确追踪。基于追踪结果，我们进一步建立了一种自动化高通量方法，用于定量分析多种运动参数，包括运动速度、身体弯曲角度和翻滚频率，从而为复杂线虫行为的高精度自动化分析奠定了坚实基础。比较评估表明，所提出的增强型秀丽隐杆线虫检测框架优于现有方法，实现了99.5%的精确度、98.7%的召回率和99.6%的mAP50，处理速度达到每秒153帧（FPS）。本研究开发的线虫检测、追踪和自动化行为分析框架，在提供卓越的检测和追踪精度的同时，增强了追踪的连续性和鲁棒性。与传统劳动密集型测量方法不同，我们的框架支持同时追踪多条线虫，并能高精度地自动化提取各种行为参数。此外，我们的方法推动了秀丽隐杆线虫行为参数分析的标准化，能够同时分析多条线虫的行为数据，显著提高了实验通量，并为药物筛选、基因功能研究等领域提供了高效工具。

AI & Computational Biology.title: A combined biochemical and computational approach provides evidence for membrane remodelling by the structural scaffold of the endocytic TPLATE complex
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02146-yThe manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Eukaryotic cells maintain homeostasis of their outer membrane by controlled internalization of lipid and protein constituents via endocytosis. Endocytosis is evolutionary conserved and uses similarly folded domains. How these structural folds are combined into proteins and protein complexes, however, differs between eukaryotic kingdoms. The TPLATE complex (TPC) in plants is an evolutionary ancient protein module that combines several protein domains with a conserved role in endocytosis into a single octameric protein complex. Its molecular architecture, lipid-nucleated condensate formation and requirement for clathrin cage curvature revealed its function in endocytosis initiation in plants. Mechanistic understanding of how this complex drives membrane deformation during plant endocytosis is, however, lacking. Here we used an integrative structural approach to obtain a precise molecular structure of the TPC of Arabidopsis thaliana. In addition, our approach allowed visualizing the structural flexibility that hallmarks this enigmatic complex. We prove that the intrinsic structural flexibility is required for its functionality and membrane recruitment. The membrane-binding interface consists of several domains with differential lipid preferences. Finally, we demonstrate via molecular dynamics simulations that the crescent shape of the structured part of the complex is sufficient for membrane curvature generation. Our mechanistic insight, obtained by a combined biochemical and computational approach, shows that the structured part of the TPC likely contributes to the execution of plant endocytosis, which does not depend on cytoskeletal-based force generation. The manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.
AI & Computational Biology.authors_short: Kraus, Julia M. et al., Van Damme, Daniël
AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 结合生化与计算方法揭示内吞TPLATE复合体结构支架介导的膜重塑
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 真核细胞通过内吞作用受控地内化脂质和蛋白质组分，从而维持其外膜的稳态。内吞作用在进化上是保守的，并利用相似折叠的结构域。然而，这些结构折叠如何组合成蛋白质和蛋白质复合体，在不同真核生物界之间存在差异。植物中的TPLATE复合体（TPC）是一个进化上古老的蛋白质模块，它将多个在内吞作用中具有保守作用的蛋白质结构域组合成一个单一的八聚体蛋白质复合体。它的分子结构、脂质诱导的凝聚物形成以及对网格蛋白笼曲率的需求揭示了其在植物内吞起始中的功能。然而，关于该复合体如何在植物内吞过程中驱动膜变形的机制理解仍然缺乏。在本研究中，我们采用了一种整合结构方法，获得了拟南芥TPC的精确分子结构。此外，我们的方法还能够可视化该神秘复合体所特有的结构柔性。我们证明了其固有的结构柔性对其功能和膜招募是必需的。其膜结合界面由多个具有不同脂质偏好的结构域组成。最后，我们通过分子动力学模拟证明，该复合体结构化部分的月牙形足以产生膜曲率。我们通过结合生化与计算方法获得的机制洞察表明，TPC的结构化部分可能有助于植物内吞作用的执行，且该过程不依赖于细胞骨架产生的力。本文采用整合方法，构建了多亚基内吞TPLATE复合体的全面结构，并研究了其膜靶向及其在植物内吞起始阶段膜变形中的作用。

AI & Computational Biology.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: AlphaSync：一个与UniProt同步的增强型AlphaFold结构数据库
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构的准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质和异构体的预测。AlphaSync为42个物种（包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物）实现了完整且最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将有助于蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模且详细地进行蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Comprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09850-xComprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Echocardiography is the most widely used cardiac imaging modality, capturing ultrasound video data to assess cardiac structure and function1. Artificial intelligence (AI) in echocardiography has the potential to streamline manual tasks and improve reproducibility and precision2. However, most echocardiography AI models are single-view, single-task systems that do not synthesize complementary information from multiple views captured during a full exam3,4, and thus lead to limited performance and scope of applications. To address this problem, we introduce EchoPrime, a multi-view, view-informed, video-based vision-language foundation model trained on over 12 million video-report pairs. EchoPrime uses contrastive learning to train a unified embedding model for all standard views in a comprehensive echocardiogram study with representation of both rare and common diseases and diagnoses. EchoPrime then utilizes view-classification and a view-informed anatomic attention module to weight video-specific embeddings that accurately map the relationship between echocardiographic views and anatomical structures. With retrieval-augmented interpretation, EchoPrime integrates information from all echocardiogram videos in a comprehensive study and performs holistic clinical interpretation. In datasets from five international independent healthcare systems, EchoPrime achieves state-of-the art performance on 23 diverse benchmarks of cardiac form and function, surpassing the performance of both task-specific approaches and prior foundation models. Following rigorous clinical evaluation, EchoPrime can assist physicians in the automated preliminary assessment of comprehensive echocardiography.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 基于视图引导视觉语言AI的综合超声心动图评估
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 超声心动图是应用最广泛的心脏影像学检查方法，通过捕获超声视频数据来评估心脏结构和功能1。人工智能（AI）在超声心动图领域的应用，有望简化人工操作，提高检查的重现性和精确性2。然而，大多数超声心动图AI模型是单视图、单任务系统，无法综合利用完整检查过程中捕获的多个视图的互补信息3,4，从而导致其性能和应用范围受限。为解决此问题，我们引入了EchoPrime，这是一个多视图、视图引导、基于视频的视觉语言基础模型，其训练数据超过1200万个视频-报告对。EchoPrime利用对比学习，为综合超声心动图研究中的所有标准视图训练了一个统一的嵌入模型，该模型能够表征罕见和常见疾病及诊断。EchoPrime随后利用视图分类和视图引导的解剖学注意力模块，对视频特异性嵌入进行加权，从而精确映射超声心动图视图与解剖结构之间的关系。通过检索增强型解释，EchoPrime整合了综合研究中所有超声心动图视频的信息，并进行整体临床解读。在来自五个国际独立医疗系统的数据集中，EchoPrime在23个不同的心脏形态和功能基准测试中取得了最先进的性能，超越了任务特异性方法和现有基础模型的表现。经过严格的临床评估，EchoPrime能够辅助医生对综合超声心动图进行自动化初步评估。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Stable clonal contribution of lineage-restricted stem cells to human hematopoiesis
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02405-wThis study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Dynamic steady-state lineage contribution of human hematopoietic stem cell (HSC) clones needs to be assessed over time. However, clonal contribution of HSCs has only been investigated at single time points and without assessing the critical erythroid and platelet lineages. Here we screened for somatic mutations in healthy aged individuals, identifying expanded HSC clones accessible for lineage tracing of all major blood cell lineages. In addition to HSC clones with balanced contribution to all lineages, we identified clones with all myeloid lineages but no or few B and T lymphocytes or all myeloid lineages and B cells but no T cells. No other lineage restriction patterns were reproducibly observed. Retrospective phylogenetic inferences uncovered a ‘hierarchical’ pattern of descendant subclones more lineage biased than their ancestral clone and a more common ‘stable’ pattern with descendant subclones showing highly concordant lineage contributions with their ancestral clone, despite decades of separation. Prospective lineage tracing confirmed remarkable stability over years of HSC clones with distinct lineage replenishment patterns. This study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Yoshizato, Tetsuichi et al., Jacobsen, Sten Eirik W.
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 谱系限制性干细胞对人类造血的稳定克隆贡献
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 人类造血干细胞（HSC）克隆的动态稳态谱系贡献需要进行长期评估。然而，HSC的克隆贡献此前仅在单一时间点进行过研究，且未评估关键的红系和血小板谱系。本研究通过筛查健康老年个体中的体细胞突变，识别出可用于所有主要血细胞谱系追踪的扩增HSC克隆。除了对所有谱系均有平衡贡献的HSC克隆外，我们还发现了一些克隆，它们贡献于所有髓系谱系但缺乏或仅有少量B和T淋巴细胞，或贡献于所有髓系谱系和B细胞但缺乏T细胞。未观察到其他可重复的谱系限制模式。回顾性系统发育推断揭示了一种“分层”模式，其中子代亚克隆比其祖代克隆表现出更强的谱系偏向性；以及一种更常见的“稳定”模式，其中子代亚克隆尽管分离数十年，但与祖代克隆表现出高度一致的谱系贡献。前瞻性谱系追踪证实了具有不同谱系补充模式的HSC克隆在数年内表现出显著的稳定性。本研究利用体细胞突变作为天然条形码系统，回顾性和前瞻性地追踪健康老年个体中造血干细胞在所有主要血细胞谱系中的命运。它揭示了在天然人类造血过程中存在内在命运偏向的造血干细胞，并通过移植实验得到了验证。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Regulation of corneal stromal cell behavior by modulating curvature using a hydraulically-controlled organ chip array
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64889-8Kim and colleagues propose a curvature-controlled organ chip array to monitor how geometric stress drives corneal disease progression. The authors show that geometric stress triggers cellular changes that replicate keratoconus pathology and they identify dysregulated molecular pathways for potential therapeutic approaches.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Corneal curvature abnormalities drive ectatic diseases, yet their mechanobiological effects on stromal cells remain poorly understood. We developed a hydraulically controlled curvature array chip recapitulating disease-relevant geometries (33-56D) to investigate how keratocytes, fibroblasts, and myofibroblasts respond to geometric stress. Curvature-induced mechanical stress triggered dramatic cellular remodeling keratocytes exhibited significant proliferative enhancement and phenotypic transformation with ALDH3A1 downregulation and α-SMA upregulation, indicating mechanobiologically driven fibrotic activation. Fibroblasts developed curvature-dependent orthogonal alignment that recapitulates native corneal lamellar organization without chemical cues, while myofibroblasts showed enhanced contractile responses. RNA sequencing revealed that geometric stress activates identical molecular pathways dysregulated in keratoconus, including TGF-β/SMAD signaling, ECM-receptor interactions, and inflammatory cascades. Extracellular matrix remodeling was cell-type specific, with keratocytes showing homeostatic control loss, fibroblasts promoting matrix deposition, and myofibroblasts driving degradation. These findings establish curvature-induced mechanotransduction as the fundamental driver of corneal ectatic disease progression, repositioning geometric stress from a passive consequence to an active determinant of pathology. Kim and colleagues propose a curvature-controlled organ chip array to monitor how geometric stress drives corneal disease progression. The authors show that geometric stress triggers cellular changes that replicate keratoconus pathology and they identify dysregulated molecular pathways for potential therapeutic approaches.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 利用水力控制的器官芯片阵列通过调节曲率来调控角膜基质细胞行为
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 角膜曲率异常是导致角膜扩张性疾病的原因，但其对基质细胞的机械生物学效应仍知之甚少。我们开发了一种水力控制的曲率阵列芯片，该芯片能够重现与疾病相关的几何形状（33-56D），以研究角膜细胞、成纤维细胞和肌成纤维细胞如何响应几何应力。曲率诱导的机械应力触发了显著的细胞重塑：角膜细胞表现出显著的增殖增强和表型转化，伴随着ALDH3A1下调和α-SMA上调，这表明机械生物学驱动的纤维化激活。成纤维细胞形成了曲率依赖性的正交排列，在没有化学信号的情况下重现了天然角膜板层结构，而肌成纤维细胞则表现出增强的收缩反应。RNA测序显示，几何应力激活了圆锥角膜中失调的相同分子通路，包括TGF-β/SMAD信号、ECM-受体相互作用和炎症级联反应。细胞外基质重塑具有细胞类型特异性：角膜细胞表现出稳态控制丧失，成纤维细胞促进基质沉积，而肌成纤维细胞则驱动降解。这些发现确立了曲率诱导的机械转导是角膜扩张性疾病进展的基本驱动因素，将几何应力从被动结果重新定位为病理学的主动决定因素。Kim及其同事提出了一种曲率控制的器官芯片阵列，用于监测几何应力如何驱动角膜疾病进展。作者表明，几何应力触发的细胞变化复制了圆锥角膜的病理学特征，并确定了可能用于治疗方法的失调分子通路。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Digital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Clinical & Medicine.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00596-wDigital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: The development of effective interventions for neurodegenerative disorders, such as posterior cortical atrophy (a visual Alzheimer’s variant), remains to be a significant clinical challenge. We introduce a computational framework using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as in silico models to simulate visual system degeneration and evaluate intervention strategies. By modeling controlled synaptic decay and comparing three distinct retraining approaches, random data (control), accuracy-based, and entropy-based, we assess impacts on classification performance and neural representation geometry. Our results demonstrate that accuracy-based retraining outperformed other strategies, maintaining model performance and preserving optimal manifold geometry during intermediate degeneration stages. This computational analysis supports prioritizing accuracy-targeted interventions for cognitive compensation. Our framework enables rapid evaluation of intervention efficacy while elucidating computational principles underlying neurodegeneration and recovery. This approach offers a platform for refining strategies to slow visual-cognitive decline in neurodegenerative diseases, bridging mechanistic insights with clinical translation.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Moore, Jasmine A. et al., Forkert, Nils D.
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 数字模拟痴呆与退化神经网络认知干预策略的评估
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 神经退行性疾病（如后皮层萎缩，一种视觉型阿尔茨海默病变体）有效干预措施的开发，仍然是一个重大的临床挑战。我们引入了一个计算框架，该框架利用卷积神经网络（CNNs）作为计算机模拟模型，以模拟视觉系统退化并评估干预策略。通过模拟受控的突触衰减，并比较三种不同的再训练方法——随机数据（对照）、基于准确性以及基于熵的方法，我们评估了它们对分类性能和神经表征几何结构的影响。我们的结果表明，在中间退化阶段，基于准确性的再训练优于其他策略，能够保持模型性能并保留最佳流形几何结构。这项计算分析支持优先采用以准确性为目标的干预措施进行认知补偿。我们的框架能够快速评估干预措施的有效性，同时阐明神经退行性变和恢复背后的计算原理。这种方法为完善减缓神经退行性疾病中视觉-认知衰退的策略提供了一个平台，将机制洞察与临床转化相结合。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Individual trajectories for recovery of neocortical activity in disorders of consciousness
Clinical & Medicine.summary: by Prejaas K. B. Tewarie, Romesh Abeysuriya, Rajanikant Panda, Pablo Nùñez, Marie M. Vitello, Glenn van der Lande, Olivia Gosseries, Aurore Thibaut, Steven Laureys, Gustavo Deco, Jitka AnnenThe evolution from disturbed brain activity to physiological brain rhythms can precede recovery in patients with disorders of consciousness (DoC). Accordingly, intriguing questions arise: What are the pathophysiological factors associated to disrupted brain rhythms in patients with DoC, and are there potential pathways for individual patients with DoC to return to normal brain rhythms? We addressed these questions at the individual subject level using biophysical simulations based on electroencephalography (EEG). The main findings are that unconscious patients exhibit a loss of excitatory corticothalamic synaptic strength. Synaptic plasticity in this excitatory corticothalamic circuitry facilitates the return of physiological brain rhythms, characterized by the reappearance of spectral peaks and flattening of the aperiodic (1/f) component of the power spectrum, in the selection of patients with DoC, particularly in those who are minimally conscious. The extent to which this occurred was correlated with cerebral glucose uptake. The current findings emphasize the importance of excitatory thalamocortical activity in reestablishing normal brain rhythms after brain injury and show that biophysical modelling of the corticothalamic circuitry could help select patients who might be potentially receptive to treatment and undergo plasticity.

We addressed these questions at the individual subject level using biophysical simulations based on electroencephalography (EEG). The main findings are that unconscious patients exhibit a loss of excitatory corticothalamic synaptic strength. Synaptic plasticity in this excitatory corticothalamic circuitry facilitates the return of physiological brain rhythms, characterized by the reappearance of spectral peaks and flattening of the aperiodic (1/f) component of the power spectrum, in the selection of patients with DoC, particularly in those who are minimally conscious. The extent to which this occurred was correlated with cerebral glucose uptake. The current findings emphasize the importance of excitatory thalamocortical activity in reestablishing normal brain rhythms after brain injury and show that biophysical modelling of the corticothalamic circuitry could help select patients who might be potentially receptive to treatment and undergo plasticity.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Prejaas K. B. Tewarie et al., Jitka Annen
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 意识障碍中新皮层活动恢复的个体轨迹
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 意识障碍 (DoC) 患者中，从紊乱的脑活动演变为生理性脑节律可能预示着恢复。因此，引人深思的问题随之出现：意识障碍患者中，与脑节律紊乱相关的病理生理学因素是什么？以及个体意识障碍患者是否存在恢复正常脑节律的潜在途径？我们利用基于脑电图 (EEG) 的生物物理模拟，在个体层面探讨了这些问题。主要发现是，无意识患者表现出兴奋性皮层-丘脑突触强度的丧失。在部分意识障碍患者，尤其是微意识状态患者中，这种兴奋性皮层-丘脑回路中的突触可塑性促进了生理性脑节律的恢复，其特征是频谱峰值的再现以及功率谱中非周期性 (1/f) 成分的平坦化。这种恢复的程度与脑葡萄糖摄取量相关。当前研究结果强调了兴奋性丘脑-皮层活动在脑损伤后重建正常脑节律中的重要性，并表明皮层-丘脑回路的生物物理建模有助于筛选可能对治疗有反应并经历可塑性变化的患者。

Molecular Design.title: Nickel-catalyzed arylative telomerization of isoprene
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64893-yDeveloping new transformations of bulky chemicals is an important approach to expand the horizons of current chemistry. Instead of traditional hydroarylation of dienes, the authors herein demonstrate a nickel-catalyzed arylative telomerization of isoprene with high chemo- and regioselectivities.
Molecular Design.abstract: Developing new transformations of bulky chemicals is an important approach to expand the reaction boundary of current chemistry. Instead of traditional hydroarylation of dienes, we herein demonstrate a nickel-catalyzed arylative telomerization of isoprene with high chemo- and regioselectivities. By utilizing a bulky mono-phosphine ligand, a range of structurally diverse aryl substituted terpenes are created efficiently under redox-neutral conditions. Preliminary mechanistic studies suggest this telomerization proceeds through an oxidative cyclometallation of isoprene with Ni(0) species followed by arylation with organoboron reagents. Beyond enabling efficient isoprene transformation, this work also provides a supplementary approach for the monoterpenoids synthesis. Developing new transformations of bulky chemicals is an important approach to expand the horizons of current chemistry. Instead of traditional hydroarylation of dienes, the authors herein demonstrate a nickel-catalyzed arylative telomerization of isoprene with high chemo- and regioselectivities.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Wang, Xiao-Yu et al., Chen, Qing-An
Molecular Design.title_cn: 镍催化异戊二烯的芳基化端基聚合
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 开发大宗化学品的新转化方法是拓展当前化学反应边界的重要途径。本文报道了一种不同于传统的二烯烃氢芳基化反应的镍催化异戊二烯芳基化端基聚合反应，该反应具有高化学选择性和区域选择性。通过使用大位阻单膦配体，在氧化还原中性条件下高效合成了多种结构多样的芳基取代萜烯。初步机理研究表明，该端基聚合反应通过异戊二烯与Ni(0)物种的氧化环金属化，随后与有机硼试剂进行芳基化而发生。除了实现高效的异戊二烯转化，这项工作还为单萜类化合物的合成提供了一种补充方法。开发大宗化学品的新转化方法是拓展当前化学视野的重要途径。不同于传统的二烯烃氢芳基化反应，作者在此展示了一种具有高化学选择性和区域选择性的镍催化异戊二烯芳基化端基聚合反应。

Molecular Design.title: Catalytic asymmetric constructions of nitrogen, boron and carbon continuous stereogenic centers
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64905-xAlthough methods to enantioselectively assemble consecutive carbon stereocenters are abundant, establishing enriched continuous heteroatomic stereocenters remains a challenge. Here the authors report a protocol to synthesize continuous heteroatomic stereocenters from cyclic amine boranes and diazo compounds via asymmetric B-H insertion reaction.
Molecular Design.abstract: Precise construction of molecular chirality is a longstanding scientific challenge in synthetic chemistry. Although methods to enantioselectively assemble consecutive carbon stereocenters are abundant, courses to establish enriched continuous heteroatomic stereocenters have acquired less attention and remain a tremendous challenge. Of those atoms in main group elements, nitrogen and boron are the most intractable ones to control their chirality. The copper-catalyzed asymmetric insertion reaction is one of the most significant transformations to construct C-B bonds in organic synthesis. Herein, we report a protocol to synthesize troublesome continuous heteroatomic stereocenters from cyclic amine boranes and diazo compounds via asymmetric B-H insertion reaction. The protocol is compatible with a wide range of amine boranes and diazo compounds, exhibiting high diastereo- and enantioselectivities. Mechanistic studies reveal a meaningful kinetic resolution pathway involved in the transformation and DFT calculations elucidate the origins of stereoselectivity and diastereoselectivity. Although methods to enantioselectively assemble consecutive carbon stereocenters are abundant, establishing enriched continuous heteroatomic stereocenters remains a challenge. Here the authors report a protocol to synthesize continuous heteroatomic stereocenters from cyclic amine boranes and diazo compounds via asymmetric B-H insertion reaction.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Zhang, Guan et al., Song, Qiuling
Molecular Design.title_cn: 氮、硼和碳连续手性中心的催化不对称构建
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 分子手性的精确构建是合成化学领域一个长期存在的科学挑战。尽管对映选择性组装连续碳手性中心的方法已非常丰富，但建立富集连续杂原子手性中心的研究却鲜有关注，并仍然是一个巨大的挑战。在主族元素中，氮和硼是控制其手性最具挑战性的原子。铜催化不对称插入反应是有机合成中构建C-B键最重要的转化之一。本文中，我们报道了一种通过不对称B-H插入反应，利用环状胺硼烷和重氮化合物合成难以构建的连续杂原子手性中心的方法。该方法适用于多种胺硼烷和重氮化合物，并表现出高非对映选择性和高对映选择性。机理研究揭示了该转化中涉及一个有意义的动力学拆分途径，并且密度泛函理论（DFT）计算阐明了立体选择性和非对映选择性的起源。尽管对映选择性组装连续碳手性中心的方法已非常丰富，但建立富集连续杂原子手性中心仍然是一个挑战。作者在此报道了一种通过不对称B-H插入反应，利用环状胺硼烷和重氮化合物合成连续杂原子手性中心的方法。

Molecular Design.title: Heteroaromatic π-stacking engineered near-infrared absorption for highly stable near-zero transmittance electrochromic window
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64955-1Electrochromic materials have been used in thermal management systems though it is challenging due to limited NIR and long-term instability. Here the authors design an electrochromic organogel for stable electrochromic windows.
Molecular Design.abstract: Electrochromic (EC) devices based on structurally designable and color-tunable EC molecules can dynamically regulate light-heat transmittance via the charge-transfer mechanism, yet face challenges of limited near-infrared (NIR) absorption, long-term instability, and restricted modulation modes. Here, we show that π-stacking of heteroaromatic tri-pyridine molecules with a 1,3,5-triazine core (H-TriPy) enhances molecular conjugation, significantly augments NIR absorption, and enables dual-band modulation with improved visual comfort. The three pyridine-based redox centers facilitate multi-step electron transfer, enabling multi-modal EC regulation, including bright, cool, and dark modes. Incorporation of a fluorinated ionic liquid into EC organogels inhibits irreversible π-stacking of high-concentration H-TriPy. Consequently, H-TriPy-based EC devices achieve neutral-colored states with near-zero transmittance as low as 3.7% in both visible and NIR ranges and maintain high switching stability of over 89.1% retention after 100,000 cycles. Furthermore, large-area EC devices exhibit uniform tinting and reliable stability, underscoring their potential for energy-efficient green buildings. Electrochromic materials have been used in thermal management systems though it is challenging due to limited NIR and long-term instability. Here the authors design an electrochromic organogel for stable electrochromic windows.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Wu, Xilu et al., Wang, Hongzhi
Molecular Design.title_cn: 杂芳香π-堆叠工程化近红外吸收，实现高稳定性近零透射电致变色窗
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 基于结构可设计和颜色可调的电致变色（EC）分子，EC器件能够通过电荷转移机制动态调节光热透射率。然而，它们面临近红外（NIR）吸收有限、长期不稳定性以及调制模式受限等挑战。在此，我们展示了具有1,3,5-三嗪核心的杂芳香三吡啶分子（H-TriPy）的π-堆叠能够增强分子共轭，显著提高近红外吸收，并实现具有改善视觉舒适度的双波段调制。三个基于吡啶的氧化还原中心促进了多步电子转移，从而实现了多模式EC调控，包括明亮、凉爽和黑暗模式。将氟化离子液体引入EC有机凝胶中，可以抑制高浓度H-TriPy的不可逆π-堆叠。因此，基于H-TriPy的EC器件在可见光和近红外波段均实现了近零透射率（低至3.7%）的无色状态，并在100,000次循环后保持了超过89.1%的高开关稳定性。此外，大面积EC器件表现出均匀的着色和可靠的稳定性，凸显了其在节能绿色建筑中的应用潜力。尽管电致变色材料已被用于热管理系统，但其有限的近红外吸收和长期不稳定性带来了挑战。本文作者设计了一种用于稳定电致变色窗的电致变色有机凝胶。

Molecular Design.title: Achieving electrochemical and mechanical stability in a lightweight titanium alloy
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64875-0Seawater corrosion can impact the lifespan and reliability of metallic materials for marine applications. This work develops a titanium alloy exhibiting active passivation behavior that ensures its electrochemical and mechanical stability in seawater-like environments.
Molecular Design.abstract: Titanium alloys represent a promising material in marine applications, focusing on high-stakes environments where their corrosion resistance and high specific strength offer significant benefits. However, they can still be vulnerable to localized corrosion, such as pitting corrosion and stress corrosion cracking, in the presence of aggressive chlorides. Here we report a lightweight titanium alloy that addresses these issues through conventional casting and thermal-mechanical processing. The alloy can generate a passive film showing distinct but stable electrochemical responses. It is found that the reaction of the passive film can shift from the slow accumulation in the passive region, to the rapid buildup of passive layers in extreme anodic potentials. Consequently, the alloy exhibits a pitting potential above 10 VSCE without being subjected to localized corrosion. Meanwhile, mechanical reliability is also achieved during stress corrosion tests, owing to the fast repair of the passive film that substantially constrains the crack propagation. Such virtual immunity to seawater corrosion qualifies this titanium alloy as a potential candidate for long-term cost savings and sustainability. Seawater corrosion can impact the lifespan and reliability of metallic materials for marine applications. This work develops a titanium alloy exhibiting active passivation behavior that ensures its electrochemical and mechanical stability in seawater-like environments.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Zhang, Jixun et al., Yang, Tao
Molecular Design.title_cn: 实现轻质钛合金的电化学与机械稳定性
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 钛合金在海洋应用中是一种极具前景的材料，尤其是在高风险环境中，其优异的耐腐蚀性和高比强度能带来显著优势。然而，在侵蚀性氯化物存在下，钛合金仍易受到局部腐蚀，例如点蚀和应力腐蚀开裂。本文报道了一种轻质钛合金，通过常规铸造和热机械加工解决了这些问题。该合金能形成一种钝化膜，表现出独特而稳定的电化学响应。研究发现，钝化膜的反应可以从钝化区缓慢积累转变为在极端阳极电位下快速形成钝化层。因此，该合金表现出高于10 VSCE的点蚀电位，且未发生局部腐蚀。同时，在应力腐蚀测试中也实现了机械可靠性，这归因于钝化膜的快速修复，其显著抑制了裂纹扩展。这种对海水腐蚀的“虚拟免疫”使该钛合金成为实现长期成本节约和可持续发展的潜在候选材料。海水腐蚀会影响海洋应用中金属材料的使用寿命和可靠性。本工作开发了一种具有主动钝化行为的钛合金，确保了其在类海水环境中的电化学和机械稳定性。

A new method — fluorogen-activating coincidence encounter sensing (FACES) — combines biorthogonal metabolic labeling with organelle-targeted fluorogen-activating proteins to selectively visualize lipids on leaflets of interest in any organelle.

Molecular Design.title_cn: FACES：揭示膜双层脂质组成的新方法
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 长期以来，在活细胞中以膜小叶特异性分辨率研究脂质组成的方法一直缺乏。一种名为荧光原激活偶联遭遇传感（FACES）的新方法，结合了生物正交代谢标记和靶向细胞器的荧光原激活蛋白，从而能够在任何细胞器中选择性地可视化目标膜小叶上的脂质。

Molecular Design.title: Ca<sup>2+</sup>-driven PDIA6 biomolecular condensation ensures proinsulin folding
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01794-8Lee et al. show that Ca²⁺ triggers condensates enriched with PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and chaperone, along with other protein disulfide isomerase family proteins and some chaperones that in turn enhance folding of proinsulin.
Molecular Design.abstract: The endoplasmic reticulum (ER) plays crucial roles in maintaining protein quality control and regulating dynamic Ca2+ storage in eukaryotic cells. However, the proteostasis system involved in ER-mediated protein quality control has not been fully characterized. Here we show that Ca2+ triggers the condensation of PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and molecular chaperone, into quality control granules. In contrast to the condensation mechanism observed for proteins containing low-complexity domains, our results indicate that transient but specific electrostatic interactions occur between the first and the third folded thioredoxin-like domains of PDIA6. We further show that the PDIA6 condensates recruit proinsulin, thereby accelerating the oxidative proinsulin folding and suppressing the proinsulin aggregation inside quality control granules, essential for secretion of insulin. Lee et al. show that Ca²⁺ triggers condensates enriched with PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and chaperone, along with other protein disulfide isomerase family proteins and some chaperones that in turn enhance folding of proinsulin.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Lee, Young-Ho et al., Okumura, Masaki
Molecular Design.title_cn: 钙离子驱动的PDIA6生物分子凝聚确保胰岛素原折叠
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 内质网（ER）在维持真核细胞蛋白质质量控制和调节动态钙离子（Ca²⁺）储存方面发挥着关键作用。然而，内质网介导的蛋白质质量控制所涉及的蛋白质稳态系统尚未完全阐明。本研究揭示，Ca²⁺触发了内质网驻留的二硫键异构酶和分子伴侣PDIA6的凝聚，形成质量控制颗粒。与含有低复杂性结构域的蛋白质所观察到的凝聚机制不同，我们的结果表明，PDIA6的第一个和第三个折叠的硫氧还蛋白样结构域之间发生了瞬态但特异性的静电相互作用。我们进一步证明，PDIA6凝聚体能够招募胰岛素原，从而加速氧化性胰岛素原的折叠并抑制质量控制颗粒内的胰岛素原聚集，这对于胰岛素的分泌至关重要。Lee等人研究表明，Ca²⁺触发了富含内质网驻留的二硫键异构酶和伴侣蛋白PDIA6以及其他蛋白质二硫键异构酶家族蛋白和一些伴侣蛋白的凝聚体形成，这些凝聚体进而促进了胰岛素原的折叠。

Molecular Design.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
Molecular Design.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Lang, Benjamin et al., Babu, M. Madan
Molecular Design.title_cn: AlphaSync：一个与UniProt同步的增强型AlphaFold结构数据库
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构的准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质和异构体的预测。AlphaSync为42个物种（包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物）实现了完整且最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将有助于蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模且详细地进行蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

Microbiology.title: Variation in surface protein expression leads to heterogeneous Trypanosoma cruzi populations during host cell infection
Microbiology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64900-2The authors assembled a high-resolution genome of Trypanosoma cruzi and, integrating transcriptomics, proteomics, and patient antibody responses, uncovered that this pathogen uses antigenic variation, suggesting strategies of infection persistence.
Microbiology.abstract: Trypanosoma cruzi possesses hundreds of genes associated with pathogenesis. The extent and organization of this diverse gene repertoire, expression, and role in infection remain unclear. Using accurate long-read sequencing and chromatin conformation capture, we assembled T. cruzi Sylvio X10 strain chromosomes from telomere-to-telomere. The genome provides accurate organization of multigene family genes, confirming their distribution in expanded clusters or scattered throughout the chromosomes. Quantitative proteomics shows stage-specific proteins and numerous trans-sialidases upregulated in trypomastigotes. The expression of virulence gene families varied in trypomastigotes after each round of cell infection, resulting in heterogeneous parasite populations with variable cell invasion capacity. A T. cruzi genome-wide yeast surface display screen against Chagas disease patients’ antibodies reveals genes expressed during human infections. However, limited conservation in their antibody-binding sites suggests their sequence diversity and variation might help parasites avert antibody recognition. The data point to a role for some multigene families in infection persistence. The authors assembled a high-resolution genome of Trypanosoma cruzi and, integrating transcriptomics, proteomics, and patient antibody responses, uncovered that this pathogen uses antigenic variation, suggesting strategies of infection persistence.
Microbiology.authors_short: Cruz-Saavedra, Lissa et al., Cestari, Igor
Microbiology.title_cn: 表面蛋白表达变异导致宿主细胞感染过程中克氏锥虫群体的异质性
Microbiology.abstract_cn: 克氏锥虫（Trypanosoma cruzi）拥有数百个与致病性相关的基因。然而，这些多样化基因库的范围、组织方式、表达及其在感染中的作用仍不明确。本研究利用精确的长读长测序和染色质构象捕获技术，完成了克氏锥虫Sylvio X10株染色体的端粒到端粒组装。该基因组揭示了多基因家族基因的精确组织方式，证实了它们以扩展簇的形式或分散在染色体上的分布。定量蛋白质组学研究表明，在锥鞭毛体阶段，存在阶段特异性蛋白和大量上调的转唾液酸酶。在每次细胞感染后，锥鞭毛体中毒力基因家族的表达发生变化，导致寄生虫群体具有异质性，并表现出不同的细胞入侵能力。针对恰加斯病患者抗体进行的克氏锥虫全基因组酵母表面展示筛选，揭示了在人类感染过程中表达的基因。然而，这些基因的抗体结合位点保守性有限，这表明它们的序列多样性和变异可能有助于寄生虫逃避抗体识别。这些数据表明某些多基因家族在感染持续性中发挥作用。作者组装了克氏锥虫的高分辨率基因组，并整合了转录组学、蛋白质组学和患者抗体反应数据，揭示了该病原体利用抗原变异来维持感染的策略。

Microbiology.title: A phage-encoded anti-CRISPR protein co-opts host enolase to prevent type III CRISPR immunity
Microbiology.summary: Nature Microbiology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41564-025-02178-2Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.
Microbiology.abstract: CRISPR (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats) systems provide powerful adaptive immunity against phage infection. In response, phages use anti-CRISPR (Acr) proteins to evade CRISPR immunity. The few type III Acrs identified so far show conditional effectiveness in countering type III immunity or rely on unknown or poorly understood inhibitory mechanisms. Here we report the discovery of AcrIIIA2, a type III-A Acr encoded by Streptococcus thermophilus phages. Biochemical and structural analyses reveal that phage AcrIIIA2 co-opts host enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to form a ternary complex with the S. thermophilus type III-A (Csm) CRISPR ribonucleoprotein complex, obstructing its immune responses. The enolase-chaperoned AcrIIIA2 blocks the initial step of phage RNA binding, thereby preventing downstream type III anti-phage immune responses. Enolase participates in the anti-immune response by serving as an essential structural scaffold, stabilizing Acr–CRISPR interactions. These findings uncover a new anti-defence strategy that exploits a well-conserved host factor to block CRISPR immunity. Microbiology.title_cn: 噬菌体编码的抗CRISPR蛋白劫持宿主烯醇化酶以阻止III型CRISPR免疫
Microbiology.abstract_cn: CRISPR（规律间隔成簇短回文重复序列）系统为抵御噬菌体感染提供了强大的适应性免疫。作为回应，噬菌体利用抗CRISPR (Acr) 蛋白来逃避CRISPR免疫。迄今为止发现的少数III型Acr蛋白在对抗III型免疫方面表现出有条件的有效性，或者其抑制机制尚不清楚或知之甚少。在此，我们报道了AcrIIIA2的发现，这是一种由嗜热链球菌噬菌体编码的III-A型Acr蛋白。生化和结构分析揭示，噬菌体AcrIIIA2劫持宿主烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶），与嗜热链球菌III-A型(Csm) CRISPR核糖核蛋白复合体形成三元复合体，从而阻碍其免疫反应。由烯醇化酶伴护的AcrIIIA2阻断了噬菌体RNA结合的初始步骤，从而阻止了下游的III型抗噬菌体免疫反应。烯醇化酶通过充当重要的结构支架，稳定Acr-CRISPR相互作用，从而参与抗免疫反应。这些发现揭示了一种新的抗防御策略，该策略利用一个高度保守的宿主因子来阻断CRISPR免疫。嗜热链球菌噬菌体通过AcrIIIA2规避宿主CRISPR防御，AcrIIIA2与烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶）形成复合体，从而阻断噬菌体RNA结合。

Microbiology.title: Differential effect of supercoiling on bacterial transcription in topological domains
Microbiology.summary: by Boaz Goldberg, Nicolás Yehya, Jie Xiao, Sam MeyerDNA supercoiling (SC), the over- and under-winding of DNA, is generated by transcription as described in the twin-domain model. Conversely, SC also impacts transcription through torsional stress. SC therefore regulates transcription dynamically and independently of transcription factor binding, particularly in the context of chromosomal topological domains and the activity of topoisomerases in bacteria. In this work, we develop numerical simulations of SC-coupled transcription of a single gene within a topological domain, based on a model incorporating stochastic transcription and activities of topoisomerase I and gyrase. We explore the effect of several parameters not systematically assessed in previous works (role of topoisomerase activities, topological domain size, gene expression strength) and compare the simulation results to a diverse set of experimental observations ranging fromin vitrotranscription assays to transcriptomics datasets from various species. This model recapitulates the non-monotonic dependence of transcriptionin vitrowith the superhelical density of the plasmid template. Simulations ofin vivotranscription in a closed domain exhibit a qualitatively different role for the two topoisomerases, as well as qualitatively different regulatory behaviors depending on the promoter strength. Specifically, topoisomerase I is required for strongly expressed genes that may be hindered by stalled RNA Polymerase, whereas gyrase activity favors the expression of all genes by enhancing transcription initiation and modulating the burstiness of transcription. The simulations exhibit a new mechanism for transcription bursting mediated by negative SC accumulating at the promoter region and modulating the initiation rate, resulting in levels of burstiness compatible with values reported in cells. Finally, we analyze several transcriptomics datasets from a range of evolutionarily distant species and show that topoisomerase inhibition is systematically associated with the repression of highly expressed genes. Simulations show this behavior to occur within a limited parameter range and thus indicate a biologically relevant regime for the simulations. Overall, this work provides a more quantitative description of how SC contributes to differential gene regulation and transcriptional bursting in bacteria.

Microbiology.title_cn: 超螺旋对拓扑结构域中细菌转录的差异性影响
Microbiology.abstract_cn: DNA超螺旋（SC），即DNA的过度和欠度缠绕，根据双域模型，由转录过程产生。反之，SC也通过扭转应力影响转录。因此，SC动态地调控转录，且独立于转录因子结合，尤其是在细菌染色体拓扑结构域和拓扑异构酶活性的背景下。在这项工作中，我们基于一个结合了随机转录以及拓扑异构酶I和旋转酶活性的模型，开发了拓扑结构域内单个基因SC耦合转录的数值模拟。我们探讨了先前工作中未系统评估的几个参数（拓扑异构酶活性的作用、拓扑结构域大小、基因表达强度）的影响，并将模拟结果与从体外转录实验到不同物种转录组数据集的各种实验观察结果进行了比较。该模型再现了体外转录对质粒模板超螺旋密度非单调依赖性。封闭域内体内转录的模拟显示，两种拓扑异构酶的作用存在质的差异，并且根据启动子强度，调控行为也存在质的差异。具体而言，拓扑异构酶I对于可能被停滞的RNA聚合酶阻碍的强表达基因是必需的，而旋转酶活性通过增强转录起始和调节转录的爆发性来促进所有基因的表达。模拟揭示了一种新的转录爆发机制，该机制由在启动子区域积累的负SC介导并调节起始速率，从而产生与细胞中报道值相符的爆发性水平。最后，我们分析了来自一系列进化上远缘物种的多个转录组数据集，并表明拓扑异构酶抑制系统性地与高表达基因的抑制相关。模拟表明这种行为发生在有限的参数范围内，从而为模拟指明了一个生物学相关的区域。总之，这项工作更定量地描述了SC如何促进细菌中差异基因调控和转录爆发。

Immunology.title: Variation in surface protein expression leads to heterogeneous Trypanosoma cruzi populations during host cell infection
Immunology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64900-2The authors assembled a high-resolution genome of Trypanosoma cruzi and, integrating transcriptomics, proteomics, and patient antibody responses, uncovered that this pathogen uses antigenic variation, suggesting strategies of infection persistence.
Immunology.abstract: Trypanosoma cruzi possesses hundreds of genes associated with pathogenesis. The extent and organization of this diverse gene repertoire, expression, and role in infection remain unclear. Using accurate long-read sequencing and chromatin conformation capture, we assembled T. cruzi Sylvio X10 strain chromosomes from telomere-to-telomere. The genome provides accurate organization of multigene family genes, confirming their distribution in expanded clusters or scattered throughout the chromosomes. Quantitative proteomics shows stage-specific proteins and numerous trans-sialidases upregulated in trypomastigotes. The expression of virulence gene families varied in trypomastigotes after each round of cell infection, resulting in heterogeneous parasite populations with variable cell invasion capacity. A T. cruzi genome-wide yeast surface display screen against Chagas disease patients’ antibodies reveals genes expressed during human infections. However, limited conservation in their antibody-binding sites suggests their sequence diversity and variation might help parasites avert antibody recognition. The data point to a role for some multigene families in infection persistence. The authors assembled a high-resolution genome of Trypanosoma cruzi and, integrating transcriptomics, proteomics, and patient antibody responses, uncovered that this pathogen uses antigenic variation, suggesting strategies of infection persistence.

Immunology.title: YTHDF2 regulates self non-coding RNA metabolism to control inflammation and tumorigenesis
Immunology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64898-7RNA modifications influence gene regulation and disease. Here, the authors show that YTHDF2 recognizes m6A-modified U6 snRNA to prevent aberrant TLR3 activation to inhibit inflammation and skin cancer development.
Immunology.abstract: The role of m6A RNA methylation of self non-coding RNA remains poorly understood. Here we show that m6A-methylated self U6 snRNA is recognized by YTHDF2 to reduce its stability and prevent its binding to Toll-like receptor 3 (TLR3), leading to decreased inflammatory responses in human and mouse cells and mouse models. At the molecular level, endosomal U6 snRNA binds to the LRR21 domain in TLR3, independent of m6A methylation, to activate inflammatory gene expression, a mechanism that is distinct from that of the best known synthetic TLR3 agonist poly I:C. Both U6 snRNA and YTHDF2 are localized to endosomes via the transmembrane protein SIDT2, where YTHDF2 functions to prevent the U6-TLR3 interaction. We further show that UVB exposure inhibits YTHDF2 by inducing its dephosphorylation and autophagic protein degradation in human keratinocytes and mouse skin. Skin-specific deletion of Ythdf2 in mice enhanced the UVB-induced skin inflammatory response and promoted tumor initiation. Taken together, our findings demonstrate that YTHDF2 plays a crucial role in controlling inflammation by inhibiting m6A U6-mediated TLR3 activation, suggesting that YTHDF2 and m6A U6 are potential therapeutic targets for preventing and treating inflammation and tumorigenesis. Here, the authors show that YTHDF2 recognizes m6A-modified U6 snRNA to prevent aberrant TLR3 activation to inhibit inflammation and skin cancer development.

Immunology.title: Evolutionary characterization of antiviral SAMD9/9L across kingdoms supports ancient convergence and lineage-specific adaptations
Immunology.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02845-xA search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Immunology.abstract: Human SAMD9 and SAMD9L are duplicated genes that encode innate immune proteins restricting poxviruses and lentiviruses, such as human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Mutations in these genes are implicated in genetic diseases and cancer. Here we combined structural similarity searches, phylogenetics and population genomics with experimental assays of SAMD9/9L functions to resolve the evolutionary and functional dynamics of these immune proteins, spanning from prokaryotes to primates. We discovered structural analogues of SAMD9/9L in the antibacteriophage defence system, Avs, resulting from convergent evolution. Further, the predicted nuclease site was conserved in bacterial analogues and was essential for cell death, suggesting a fundamental role in defence across different life kingdoms. Despite this shared immunity, we identified genomic signatures of evolutionary arms races in mammals, with remarkable gene copy number variations. We further unveiled that the absence of SAMD9 in bonobos corresponds to a recent gene loss still segregating in the population. Finally, we found that chimpanzee and bonobo SAMD9Ls have enhanced anti-HIV-1 functions compared with the human orthologue. These SAMD9/9L adaptations probably resulted from strong viral selective pressures, including by lentiviruses, and could contribute to lentiviral resistance in bonobos. Evolutionary characterization of Avs9 and SAMD9/9L provides a deeper understanding of how the immune system adapts to fight viruses over billions of years of evolution. A search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.

Immunology.title_cn: 跨界抗病毒SAMD9/9L的演化特征支持古老趋同演化和谱系特异性适应
Immunology.abstract_cn: 人类SAMD9和SAMD9L是编码先天免疫蛋白的重复基因，这些蛋白能限制痘病毒和慢病毒，例如人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）。这些基因的突变与遗传疾病和癌症有关。本研究结合结构相似性搜索、系统发育学和群体基因组学，以及SAMD9/9L功能的实验分析，以阐明这些免疫蛋白从原核生物到灵长类动物的演化和功能动态。我们发现，在抗噬菌体防御系统Avs中存在SAMD9/9L的结构同源物，这源于趋同演化。此外，预测的核酸酶位点在细菌同源物中是保守的，并且对细胞死亡至关重要，这表明其在不同生命界域的防御中具有基础性作用。尽管存在这种共享免疫机制，我们仍在哺乳动物中发现了演化军备竞赛的基因组特征，表现出显著的基因拷贝数变异。我们进一步揭示，倭黑猩猩中SAMD9的缺失对应着近期发生的基因丢失，该基因丢失仍在种群中分离。最后，我们发现黑猩猩和倭黑猩猩的SAMD9L与人类直系同源物相比，具有增强的抗HIV-1功能。这些SAMD9/9L的适应性演化可能源于强大的病毒选择压力，包括慢病毒，并可能有助于倭黑猩猩对慢病毒的抵抗力。Avs9和SAMD9/9L的演化特征研究，为我们深入理解免疫系统如何在数十亿年的演化过程中适应并对抗病毒提供了依据。对人类SAMD9/9L抗病毒基因同源物的搜索揭示了该基因家族在细菌界和动物界中的趋同演化，其物种特异性和近期基因组特征表明了与病毒演化军备竞赛所导致的适应性。

Immunology.title: TSLP links intestinal nutrient sensing with amplification of the ILC2–tuft cell circuit
Immunology.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02328-yLocksley and colleagues describe a nutrient-sensing circuit in the small intestine. Upon feeding, TSLP production from fibroblasts is increased in a GLP-2-dependent manner, resulting in increased ILC2 activation and tuft cell hyperplasia, thus linking food intake with ILC2 activation.
Immunology.abstract: Group 2 innate lymphocytes (ILC2s) are prevalent in small intestine but their role during homeostasis is unclear. Here we show that thymic stromal lymphopoietin (TSLP)—a cytokine implicated in ILC2 activation—is expressed constitutively in subepithelial fibroblasts, including telocytes and crypt-associated trophocytes, which are specialized fibroblasts necessary to sustain epithelial identity. Feeding increases TSLP and induces ILC2 type 2 cytokines that are attenuated by deletion of TSLP in fibroblasts or TSLP receptor on ILC2s. Both mouse and human intestinal fibroblasts express receptors for glucagon-like peptide-2 (GLP-2)—an intestinotrophic growth factor released by enteroendocrine cells following food intake. GLP-2 promotes intestinal TSLP in mouse and human intestinal fibroblasts, and TSLP-dependent ILC2 activation and tuft cell hyperplasia in mice, thus linking nutrient detection with ILC2-mediated amplification of the tuft cell chemosensory circuit that promotes epithelial surveillance of ingested cargo. Locksley and colleagues describe a nutrient-sensing circuit in the small intestine. Upon feeding, TSLP production from fibroblasts is increased in a GLP-2-dependent manner, resulting in increased ILC2 activation and tuft cell hyperplasia, thus linking food intake with ILC2 activation.
