Immunology.title_cn: TSLP介导肠道营养感知与ILC2-簇状细胞回路的放大
Immunology.abstract_cn: 第二型固有淋巴细胞 (ILC2s) 在小肠中普遍存在，但其在稳态中的作用尚不明确。本研究表明，胸腺基质淋巴细胞生成素 (TSLP)——一种与ILC2活化相关的细胞因子——在包括间隙连接细胞和隐窝相关滋养细胞在内的上皮下成纤维细胞中组成性表达。这些成纤维细胞是维持上皮细胞特性所必需的特化细胞。进食可增加TSLP的表达，并诱导ILC2产生2型细胞因子；而通过敲除成纤维细胞中的TSLP或ILC2上的TSLP受体，可减弱这些效应。小鼠和人肠道成纤维细胞均表达胰高血糖素样肽-2 (GLP-2) 的受体。GLP-2是一种肠道营养性生长因子，在摄食后由肠内分泌细胞释放。GLP-2促进小鼠和人肠道成纤维细胞中肠道TSLP的产生，并促进小鼠体内TSLP依赖的ILC2活化和簇状细胞增生。这表明营养检测与ILC2介导的簇状细胞化学感应回路的放大之间存在关联，该回路促进了对摄入物质的上皮监视。Locksley及其同事描述了小肠中的一个营养感知回路。进食后，成纤维细胞产生的TSLP以GLP-2依赖的方式增加，导致ILC2活化和簇状细胞增生增加，从而将食物摄入与ILC2活化联系起来。

Immunology.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes
Immunology.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02319-zLamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Immunology.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Here we used a suite of single-cell approaches, including integrated live-cell imaging of secretion and cell fate, flow cytometry and high-content imaging, to investigate IL-1β secretion dynamics in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated primary human peripheral blood CD14+ monocytes. We found marked heterogeneity: a large fraction of cells remained viable and contributed negligibly to IL-1β secretion, challenging established models. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Immunology.authors_short: Vande Walle, Lieselotte et al., Lamkanfi, Mohamed
Immunology.title_cn: 单细胞分析揭示细胞死亡是人单核细胞中NLRP3介导的IL-1β分泌的驱动力
Immunology.abstract_cn: 白细胞介素-1β (IL-1β) 是一种关键的促炎细胞因子，在感染和炎症性疾病中发挥重要作用，但其从人单核细胞中释放的调控机制仍不清楚。本研究中，我们采用了一系列单细胞方法，包括分泌和细胞命运的整合活细胞成像、流式细胞术和高内涵成像，以研究脂多糖刺激的原代人外周血CD14+单核细胞中IL-1β的分泌动态。我们发现显著的异质性：大部分细胞保持活力，对IL-1β分泌的贡献微乎其微，这挑战了既有的模型。相反，一小部分（5-10%）经历经典NLRP3炎性体激活和GSDMD依赖性细胞焦亡的细胞产生了大部分分泌的IL-1β，而凋亡细胞向继发性坏死转变的贡献较小。对冷吡啉相关周期综合征患者CD14+单核细胞的单细胞分析证实，裂解性细胞死亡是病理性IL-1β释放的驱动力。这些发现将IL-1β重新定义为一种损伤相关分子模式，主要由垂死的单核细胞分泌。Lamkanfi、Shirasaki、Izawa及其同事的研究表明，在脂多糖刺激或携带NLRP3激活突变的人单核细胞中，IL-1β的释放主要局限于经历裂解性细胞死亡的细胞。

Immunology.title: A phage-encoded anti-CRISPR protein co-opts host enolase to prevent type III CRISPR immunity
Immunology.summary: Nature Microbiology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41564-025-02178-2Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.
Immunology.abstract: CRISPR (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats) systems provide powerful adaptive immunity against phage infection. In response, phages use anti-CRISPR (Acr) proteins to evade CRISPR immunity. The few type III Acrs identified so far show conditional effectiveness in countering type III immunity or rely on unknown or poorly understood inhibitory mechanisms. Here we report the discovery of AcrIIIA2, a type III-A Acr encoded by Streptococcus thermophilus phages. Biochemical and structural analyses reveal that phage AcrIIIA2 co-opts host enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to form a ternary complex with the S. thermophilus type III-A (Csm) CRISPR ribonucleoprotein complex, obstructing its immune responses. The enolase-chaperoned AcrIIIA2 blocks the initial step of phage RNA binding, thereby preventing downstream type III anti-phage immune responses. Enolase participates in the anti-immune response by serving as an essential structural scaffold, stabilizing Acr–CRISPR interactions. These findings uncover a new anti-defence strategy that exploits a well-conserved host factor to block CRISPR immunity. Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.
Immunology.authors_short: Johnson, Katie A. et al., Terns, Michael P.
Immunology.title_cn: 噬菌体编码的抗CRISPR蛋白劫持宿主烯醇化酶以阻止III型CRISPR免疫
Immunology.abstract_cn: CRISPR（规律间隔成簇短回文重复序列）系统为抵御噬菌体感染提供了强大的适应性免疫。作为回应，噬菌体利用抗CRISPR (Acr) 蛋白来逃避CRISPR免疫。迄今为止发现的少数III型Acr蛋白在对抗III型免疫方面表现出有条件的有效性，或者其抑制机制尚不清楚或知之甚少。在此，我们报道了AcrIIIA2的发现，这是一种由嗜热链球菌噬菌体编码的III-A型Acr蛋白。生化和结构分析揭示，噬菌体AcrIIIA2劫持宿主烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶），与嗜热链球菌III-A型(Csm) CRISPR核糖核蛋白复合体形成三元复合体，从而阻碍其免疫反应。由烯醇化酶伴护的AcrIIIA2阻断了噬菌体RNA结合的初始步骤，从而阻止了下游的III型抗噬菌体免疫反应。烯醇化酶通过充当重要的结构支架，稳定Acr-CRISPR相互作用，从而参与抗免疫反应。这些发现揭示了一种新的抗防御策略，该策略利用一个高度保守的宿主因子来阻断CRISPR免疫。嗜热链球菌噬菌体通过AcrIIIA2规避宿主CRISPR防御，AcrIIIA2与烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶）形成复合体，从而阻断噬菌体RNA结合。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: A parts list of promoters and gRNA scaffolds for mammalian genome engineering and molecular recording
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02896-2Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: A standardized ‘parts list’ of sequences for genetic engineering of microbes has been indispensable to progress in synthetic biology, but few analogous parts exist for mammalian systems. Here we design libraries of extant, ancestral, mutagenized or miniaturized variants of polymerase III promoters and guide RNA (gRNA) scaffolds and quantify their abilities to mediate precise edits to the mammalian genome through multiplex prime editing. We identify thousands of parts for reproducible editing in human and mouse cell lines, including hundreds with greater activity than commonly used sequences. Saturation mutagenesis screens identify tolerated sequence variants that further enhance sequence diversity. In an application to molecular recording, we design a ‘ten key’ array that, in mammalian cells, achieves balanced activity of pegRNAs as predicted by the activity of the component parts. The data reported here will aid the design of synthetic loci encoding arrays of gRNAs exhibiting predictable, differentiated levels of activity for applications in multiplexed perturbation, biological recorders and complex genetic circuits. Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: McDiarmid, Troy A. et al., Shendure, Jay
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 用于哺乳动物基因组工程和分子记录的启动子和gRNA骨架元件库
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 微生物基因工程的标准化“元件库”对合成生物学的发展至关重要，但哺乳动物系统中类似的元件却很少。本研究设计了聚合酶III启动子和引导RNA (gRNA) 骨架的现有、祖先、诱变或微型化变体的文库，并量化了它们通过多重先导编辑（multiplex prime editing）介导哺乳动物基因组精确编辑的能力。我们鉴定了数千个可在人源和鼠源细胞系中实现可重复编辑的元件，其中数百个元件的活性高于常用序列。饱和诱变筛选识别出可耐受的序列变体，这些变体进一步增强了序列多样性。在分子记录的应用中，我们设计了一个“十键”阵列，该阵列在哺乳动物细胞中实现了pegRNA的平衡活性，这与组成元件的活性预测一致。本研究报告的数据将有助于设计合成基因座，这些基因座编码的gRNA阵列在多重扰动、生物记录器和复杂遗传回路等应用中表现出可预测的、差异化的活性水平。哺乳动物细胞中的先导编辑受益于全面的遗传元件清单。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Computationally efficient meta-analysis of gene-based tests using summary statistics in large-scale genetic studies
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02390-0REMETA is a method for meta-analyzing gene-based associations using summary statistics, integrating with REGENIE and improving computational efficiency for large studies with many phenotypes.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Meta-analysis of gene-based tests using single-variant summary statistics is a powerful strategy for genetic association studies. However, current approaches require sharing the covariance matrix between variants for each study and trait of interest. For large-scale studies with many phenotypes, these matrices can be cumbersome to calculate, store and share. Here, to address this challenge, we present REMETA—an efficient tool for meta-analysis of gene-based tests. REMETA uses a single sparse covariance reference file per study that is rescaled for each phenotype using single-variant summary statistics. We develop new methods for binary traits with case–control imbalance, and to estimate allele frequencies, genotype counts and effect sizes of burden tests. We demonstrate the performance and advantages of our approach through meta-analysis of five traits in 469,376 samples in UK Biobank. The open-source REMETA software will facilitate meta-analysis across large-scale exome sequencing studies from diverse studies that cannot easily be combined. REMETA is a method for meta-analyzing gene-based associations using summary statistics, integrating with REGENIE and improving computational efficiency for large studies with many phenotypes.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Joseph, Tyler A. et al., Marchini, Jonathan
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 大规模遗传学研究中利用汇总统计数据进行基因水平检验的计算高效荟萃分析
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 利用单变异汇总统计数据进行基因水平检验的荟萃分析是遗传关联研究的有力策略。然而，当前方法要求针对每个研究和感兴趣的性状共享变异之间的协方差矩阵。对于具有众多表型的大规模研究，这些矩阵的计算、存储和共享可能非常繁琐。为应对这一挑战，我们在此提出REMETA——一个用于基因水平检验荟萃分析的高效工具。REMETA为每个研究使用一个稀疏协方差参考文件，该文件利用单变异汇总统计数据针对每个表型进行重新缩放。我们开发了针对病例-对照不平衡的二分类性状的新方法，并用于估计等位基因频率、基因型计数和负担检验的效应大小。我们通过对英国生物样本库中469,376个样本的五种性状进行荟萃分析，展示了我们方法的性能和优势。开源的REMETA软件将促进来自难以轻易整合的各种研究的大规模外显子组测序研究的荟萃分析。REMETA是一种利用汇总统计数据进行基因水平关联荟萃分析的方法，它与REGENIE集成，并提高了具有众多表型的大规模研究的计算效率。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Stable clonal contribution of lineage-restricted stem cells to human hematopoiesis
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02405-wThis study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Dynamic steady-state lineage contribution of human hematopoietic stem cell (HSC) clones needs to be assessed over time. However, clonal contribution of HSCs has only been investigated at single time points and without assessing the critical erythroid and platelet lineages. Here we screened for somatic mutations in healthy aged individuals, identifying expanded HSC clones accessible for lineage tracing of all major blood cell lineages. In addition to HSC clones with balanced contribution to all lineages, we identified clones with all myeloid lineages but no or few B and T lymphocytes or all myeloid lineages and B cells but no T cells. No other lineage restriction patterns were reproducibly observed. Retrospective phylogenetic inferences uncovered a ‘hierarchical’ pattern of descendant subclones more lineage biased than their ancestral clone and a more common ‘stable’ pattern with descendant subclones showing highly concordant lineage contributions with their ancestral clone, despite decades of separation. Prospective lineage tracing confirmed remarkable stability over years of HSC clones with distinct lineage replenishment patterns. This study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Yoshizato, Tetsuichi et al., Jacobsen, Sten Eirik W.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 谱系限制性干细胞对人类造血的稳定克隆贡献
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 人类造血干细胞（HSC）克隆的动态稳态谱系贡献需要进行长期评估。然而，HSC的克隆贡献此前仅在单一时间点进行过研究，且未评估关键的红系和血小板谱系。本研究通过筛查健康老年个体中的体细胞突变，识别出可用于所有主要血细胞谱系追踪的扩增HSC克隆。除了对所有谱系均有平衡贡献的HSC克隆外，我们还发现了一些克隆，它们贡献于所有髓系谱系但缺乏或仅有少量B和T淋巴细胞，或贡献于所有髓系谱系和B细胞但缺乏T细胞。未观察到其他可重复的谱系限制模式。回顾性系统发育推断揭示了一种“分层”模式，其中子代亚克隆比其祖代克隆表现出更强的谱系偏向性；以及一种更常见的“稳定”模式，其中子代亚克隆尽管分离数十年，但与祖代克隆表现出高度一致的谱系贡献。前瞻性谱系追踪证实了具有不同谱系补充模式的HSC克隆在数年内表现出显著的稳定性。本研究利用体细胞突变作为天然条形码系统，回顾性和前瞻性地追踪健康老年个体中造血干细胞在所有主要血细胞谱系中的命运。它揭示了在天然人类造血过程中存在内在命运偏向的造血干细胞，并通过移植实验得到了验证。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Variation in surface protein expression leads to heterogeneous Trypanosoma cruzi populations during host cell infection
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64900-2The authors assembled a high-resolution genome of Trypanosoma cruzi and, integrating transcriptomics, proteomics, and patient antibody responses, uncovered that this pathogen uses antigenic variation, suggesting strategies of infection persistence.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Trypanosoma cruzi possesses hundreds of genes associated with pathogenesis. The extent and organization of this diverse gene repertoire, expression, and role in infection remain unclear. Using accurate long-read sequencing and chromatin conformation capture, we assembled T. cruzi Sylvio X10 strain chromosomes from telomere-to-telomere. The genome provides accurate organization of multigene family genes, confirming their distribution in expanded clusters or scattered throughout the chromosomes. Quantitative proteomics shows stage-specific proteins and numerous trans-sialidases upregulated in trypomastigotes. The expression of virulence gene families varied in trypomastigotes after each round of cell infection, resulting in heterogeneous parasite populations with variable cell invasion capacity. A T. cruzi genome-wide yeast surface display screen against Chagas disease patients’ antibodies reveals genes expressed during human infections. However, limited conservation in their antibody-binding sites suggests their sequence diversity and variation might help parasites avert antibody recognition. The data point to a role for some multigene families in infection persistence. The authors assembled a high-resolution genome of Trypanosoma cruzi and, integrating transcriptomics, proteomics, and patient antibody responses, uncovered that this pathogen uses antigenic variation, suggesting strategies of infection persistence.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Cruz-Saavedra, Lissa et al., Cestari, Igor
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 表面蛋白表达变异导致宿主细胞感染过程中克氏锥虫群体的异质性
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 克氏锥虫（Trypanosoma cruzi）拥有数百个与致病性相关的基因。然而，这些多样化基因库的范围、组织方式、表达及其在感染中的作用仍不明确。本研究利用精确的长读长测序和染色质构象捕获技术，完成了克氏锥虫Sylvio X10株染色体的端粒到端粒组装。该基因组揭示了多基因家族基因的精确组织方式，证实了它们以扩展簇的形式或分散在染色体上的分布。定量蛋白质组学研究表明，在锥鞭毛体阶段，存在阶段特异性蛋白和大量上调的转唾液酸酶。在每次细胞感染后，锥鞭毛体中毒力基因家族的表达发生变化，导致寄生虫群体具有异质性，并表现出不同的细胞入侵能力。针对恰加斯病患者抗体进行的克氏锥虫全基因组酵母表面展示筛选，揭示了在人类感染过程中表达的基因。然而，这些基因的抗体结合位点保守性有限，这表明它们的序列多样性和变异可能有助于寄生虫逃避抗体识别。这些数据表明某些多基因家族在感染持续性中发挥作用。作者组装了克氏锥虫的高分辨率基因组，并整合了转录组学、蛋白质组学和患者抗体反应数据，揭示了该病原体利用抗原变异来维持感染的策略。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: YTHDF2 regulates self non-coding RNA metabolism to control inflammation and tumorigenesis
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64898-7RNA modifications influence gene regulation and disease. Here, the authors show that YTHDF2 recognizes m6A-modified U6 snRNA to prevent aberrant TLR3 activation to inhibit inflammation and skin cancer development.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: The role of m6A RNA methylation of self non-coding RNA remains poorly understood. Here we show that m6A-methylated self U6 snRNA is recognized by YTHDF2 to reduce its stability and prevent its binding to Toll-like receptor 3 (TLR3), leading to decreased inflammatory responses in human and mouse cells and mouse models. At the molecular level, endosomal U6 snRNA binds to the LRR21 domain in TLR3, independent of m6A methylation, to activate inflammatory gene expression, a mechanism that is distinct from that of the best known synthetic TLR3 agonist poly I:C. Both U6 snRNA and YTHDF2 are localized to endosomes via the transmembrane protein SIDT2, where YTHDF2 functions to prevent the U6-TLR3 interaction. We further show that UVB exposure inhibits YTHDF2 by inducing its dephosphorylation and autophagic protein degradation in human keratinocytes and mouse skin. Skin-specific deletion of Ythdf2 in mice enhanced the UVB-induced skin inflammatory response and promoted tumor initiation. Taken together, our findings demonstrate that YTHDF2 plays a crucial role in controlling inflammation by inhibiting m6A U6-mediated TLR3 activation, suggesting that YTHDF2 and m6A U6 are potential therapeutic targets for preventing and treating inflammation and tumorigenesis. RNA modifications influence gene regulation and disease. Here, the authors show that YTHDF2 recognizes m6A-modified U6 snRNA to prevent aberrant TLR3 activation to inhibit inflammation and skin cancer development.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Yang, Seungwon et al., He, Yu-Ying
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: YTHDF2调控自身非编码RNA代谢以控制炎症和肿瘤发生
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 自身非编码RNA的m6A RNA甲基化作用机制仍不清楚。本研究表明，m6A甲基化的自身U6 snRNA被YTHDF2识别，从而降低其稳定性并阻止其与Toll样受体3 (TLR3)结合，进而导致人源和鼠源细胞以及小鼠模型中炎症反应的减弱。在分子水平上，内体U6 snRNA独立于m6A甲基化，与TLR3中的LRR21结构域结合，从而激活炎症基因表达，这一机制与最著名的合成TLR3激动剂poly I:C的机制不同。U6 snRNA和YTHDF2均通过跨膜蛋白SIDT2定位于内体，YTHDF2在此处发挥作用以阻止U6-TLR3的相互作用。我们进一步发现，在人角质形成细胞和小鼠皮肤中，UVB暴露通过诱导YTHDF2的去磷酸化和自噬蛋白降解来抑制YTHDF2。小鼠中皮肤特异性敲除Ythdf2增强了UVB诱导的皮肤炎症反应并促进了肿瘤的发生。综上所述，我们的研究结果表明，YTHDF2通过抑制m6A U6介导的TLR3激活在控制炎症中发挥关键作用，这提示YTHDF2和m6A U6是预防和治疗炎症及肿瘤发生的潜在治疗靶点。RNA修饰影响基因调控和疾病。本文作者展示了YTHDF2识别m6A修饰的U6 snRNA，从而阻止异常TLR3激活，以抑制炎症和皮肤癌的发生发展。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Evolutionary characterization of antiviral SAMD9/9L across kingdoms supports ancient convergence and lineage-specific adaptations
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02845-xA search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Human SAMD9 and SAMD9L are duplicated genes that encode innate immune proteins restricting poxviruses and lentiviruses, such as human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Mutations in these genes are implicated in genetic diseases and cancer. Here we combined structural similarity searches, phylogenetics and population genomics with experimental assays of SAMD9/9L functions to resolve the evolutionary and functional dynamics of these immune proteins, spanning from prokaryotes to primates. We discovered structural analogues of SAMD9/9L in the antibacteriophage defence system, Avs, resulting from convergent evolution. Further, the predicted nuclease site was conserved in bacterial analogues and was essential for cell death, suggesting a fundamental role in defence across different life kingdoms. Despite this shared immunity, we identified genomic signatures of evolutionary arms races in mammals, with remarkable gene copy number variations. We further unveiled that the absence of SAMD9 in bonobos corresponds to a recent gene loss still segregating in the population. Finally, we found that chimpanzee and bonobo SAMD9Ls have enhanced anti-HIV-1 functions compared with the human orthologue. These SAMD9/9L adaptations probably resulted from strong viral selective pressures, including by lentiviruses, and could contribute to lentiviral resistance in bonobos. Evolutionary characterization of Avs9 and SAMD9/9L provides a deeper understanding of how the immune system adapts to fight viruses over billions of years of evolution. A search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 跨界抗病毒SAMD9/9L的演化特征支持古老趋同演化和谱系特异性适应
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 人类SAMD9和SAMD9L是编码先天免疫蛋白的重复基因，这些蛋白能限制痘病毒和慢病毒，例如人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）。这些基因的突变与遗传疾病和癌症有关。本研究结合结构相似性搜索、系统发育学和群体基因组学，以及SAMD9/9L功能的实验分析，以阐明这些免疫蛋白从原核生物到灵长类动物的演化和功能动态。我们发现，在抗噬菌体防御系统Avs中存在SAMD9/9L的结构同源物，这源于趋同演化。此外，预测的核酸酶位点在细菌同源物中是保守的，并且对细胞死亡至关重要，这表明其在不同生命界域的防御中具有基础性作用。尽管存在这种共享免疫机制，我们仍在哺乳动物中发现了演化军备竞赛的基因组特征，表现出显著的基因拷贝数变异。我们进一步揭示，倭黑猩猩中SAMD9的缺失对应着近期发生的基因丢失，该基因丢失仍在种群中分离。最后，我们发现黑猩猩和倭黑猩猩的SAMD9L与人类直系同源物相比，具有增强的抗HIV-1功能。这些SAMD9/9L的适应性演化可能源于强大的病毒选择压力，包括慢病毒，并可能有助于倭黑猩猩对慢病毒的抵抗力。Avs9和SAMD9/9L的演化特征研究，为我们深入理解免疫系统如何在数十亿年的演化过程中适应并对抗病毒提供了依据。对人类SAMD9/9L抗病毒基因同源物的搜索揭示了该基因家族在细菌界和动物界中的趋同演化，其物种特异性和近期基因组特征表明了与病毒演化军备竞赛所导致的适应性。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Reprogramming of H3K36me2 guides lineage-specific post-implantation de novo DNA methylation
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01805-8Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: In mammals, DNA methylation is re-established after implantation following post-fertilization global erasure. Yet, the underlying mechanism remains elusive. Here we investigate H3K36me2 reprogramming in mouse early development and its role in post-implantation DNA methylation re-establishment. In oocytes, H3K36me2 accumulates in gene bodies upon transcription silencing and partially persists to the eight-cell stage. De novo H3K36me2 occurs at enhancers after zygotic genome activation, before spreading genome-wide after implantation, except on the inactive X chromosome. Mutation of the H3K36me2 methyltransferase NSD1 compromises global DNA methylation after implantation preferentially in extra-embryonic lineages and that at methylation-prone promoters, including those of germline-specific genes. However, DNA methylation establishment partially bypasses H3K36me2 through upregulated DNMT3B, a ‘leaky’ H3K36me2/3 reader. This contrasts with DNMT3A, which strictly requires H3K36me2/3 for DNA methylation through its PWWP domain. Finally, DNA methylation valleys escape de novo DNA methylation via PRC1/H2AK119ub1-mediated H3K36me2 exclusion. Thus, H3K36me2 reprogramming regulates lineage- and locus-specific post-implantation DNA methylation establishment. Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: H3K36me2重编程引导谱系特异性着床后从头DNA甲基化
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，DNA甲基化在受精后经历全局擦除，随后在着床后重新建立。然而，其潜在机制仍不清楚。本研究探讨了小鼠早期发育过程中H3K36me2的重编程及其在着床后DNA甲基化重建中的作用。在卵母细胞中，H3K36me2在转录沉默后在基因体中积累，并部分持续到八细胞阶段。在合子基因组激活后，从头H3K36me2在增强子处发生，随后在着床后扩散至全基因组，但失活的X染色体除外。H3K36me2甲基转移酶NSD1的突变会损害着床后的全局DNA甲基化，尤其是在胚外谱系和易于甲基化的启动子（包括生殖系特异性基因的启动子）上。然而，DNA甲基化的建立通过上调的DNMT3B（一种“泄漏的”H3K36me2/3读取器）部分绕过了H3K36me2。这与DNMT3A形成对比，DNMT3A通过其PWWP结构域严格依赖H3K36me2/3进行DNA甲基化。最后，DNA甲基化谷通过PRC1/H2AK119ub1介导的H3K36me2排斥作用逃避从头DNA甲基化。因此，H3K36me2重编程调控着谱系和位点特异性的着床后DNA甲基化建立。Lu、Wang等人描绘了从卵母细胞到胚胎转变、着床前和着床后早期发育过程中H3K36me2的图谱，并报告了H3K36me2在着床后胚胎中重建谱系特异性DNA甲基化中的作用。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Structural basis of glucose-6-phosphate transport by human SLC37A2
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01712-4Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Glucose-6-phosphate (G6P) transporters are crucial for glucose metabolism by mediating G6P transport from the cytoplasm to endoplasmic reticulum (ER). However, their transport mechanisms remain poorly understood. Here, we elucidate the structural and functional basis of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 (SLC37A2), a G6P transporter implicated in metabolic regulation and macrophage inflammation. We show that SLC37A2 functions as a uniporter, facilitating G6P transport independent of inorganic phosphate gradients. Structures of SLC37A2 in the apo and G6P-bound states reveal a dimeric architecture. Both the ER luminal-open and cytosolic-open structures are captured, showing the structural dynamics during G6P transport. G6P is coordinated by SLC37A2 through interactions with its phosphate and hydroxyl groups. Furthermore, mapping mutations associated with glycogen storage disease type Ib onto SLC37A2 highlights residues essential for transport activity. Together, this work provides structural insights into G6P transport and establishes a framework for understanding related metabolic disorders. Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 人源SLC37A2介导葡萄糖-6-磷酸转运的结构基础
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 葡萄糖-6-磷酸 (G6P) 转运蛋白通过介导G6P从细胞质向内质网 (ER) 的转运，在葡萄糖代谢中发挥关键作用。然而，其转运机制仍不清楚。本研究阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2 (SLC37A2) 的结构和功能基础，SLC37A2是一种与代谢调节和巨噬细胞炎症相关的G6P转运蛋白。我们发现SLC37A2作为一种单向转运蛋白发挥作用，促进G6P转运，且不依赖于无机磷酸梯度。SLC37A2在脱辅基和G6P结合状态下的结构揭示了其二聚体构象。我们捕获了内质网腔开放和胞质开放两种构象，展示了G6P转运过程中的结构动态变化。G6P通过与SLC37A2的磷酸基团和羟基相互作用而被其协调。此外，将与糖原贮积病Ib型相关的突变映射到SLC37A2上，突出了对转运活性至关重要的残基。总而言之，这项工作为G6P转运提供了结构见解，并为理解相关代谢紊乱建立了框架。赖和徐等人利用冷冻电镜和功能分析阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2的葡萄糖-6-磷酸单向转运机制及其结构动态，为葡萄糖代谢和相关疾病提供了深入见解。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: IPScan: Detecting novel intronic PolyAdenylation events with RNA-seq data
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: by Naima Ahmed Fahmi, Sze Cheng, Jeovani Overstreet, Qianqian Song, Jeongsik Yong, Wei ZhangIntronic PolyAdenylation (IPA) is an important post-transcriptional mechanism that can alter transcript coding potential by truncating translation regions, thereby increasing transcriptome and proteome diversity. This process generates novel protein isoforms with altered peptide sequences, some of which are implicated in disease progression, including cancer. Truncated proteins may lose tumor-suppressive functions, contributing to oncogenesis. Despite advancements in Alternative PolyAdenylation (APA) analysis using RNA-seq, detecting and quantifying novel IPA events remains challenging. To address this, we developed IPScan, a computational pipeline for precise IPA event identification, quantification, and visualization. IPScan has been benchmarked against existing methods using simulated data, different human and mouse cell lines, and TCGA (The Cancer Genome Atlas) breast cancer datasets. Differential IPA events under different biological conditions were quantified and validated via qPCR.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: IPScan：基于RNA测序数据检测新型内含子多聚腺苷酸化事件
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 内含子多聚腺苷酸化（IPA）是一种重要的转录后机制，它通过截短翻译区域来改变转录本的编码潜力，从而增加转录组和蛋白质组的多样性。这一过程产生具有改变肽序列的新型蛋白质异构体，其中一些与疾病进展（包括癌症）有关。截短的蛋白质可能丧失肿瘤抑制功能，从而促进肿瘤发生。尽管利用RNA测序进行选择性多聚腺苷酸化（APA）分析取得了进展，但检测和量化新型IPA事件仍然具有挑战性。为解决此问题，我们开发了IPScan，这是一个用于精确识别、量化和可视化IPA事件的计算流程。IPScan已通过模拟数据、不同人鼠细胞系以及TCGA（癌症基因组图谱）乳腺癌数据集与现有方法进行了基准测试。在不同生物学条件下，差异IPA事件通过qPCR进行了量化和验证。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Differential effect of supercoiling on bacterial transcription in topological domains
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: by Boaz Goldberg, Nicolás Yehya, Jie Xiao, Sam MeyerDNA supercoiling (SC), the over- and under-winding of DNA, is generated by transcription as described in the twin-domain model. Conversely, SC also impacts transcription through torsional stress. SC therefore regulates transcription dynamically and independently of transcription factor binding, particularly in the context of chromosomal topological domains and the activity of topoisomerases in bacteria. In this work, we develop numerical simulations of SC-coupled transcription of a single gene within a topological domain, based on a model incorporating stochastic transcription and activities of topoisomerase I and gyrase. We explore the effect of several parameters not systematically assessed in previous works (role of topoisomerase activities, topological domain size, gene expression strength) and compare the simulation results to a diverse set of experimental observations ranging fromin vitrotranscription assays to transcriptomics datasets from various species. This model recapitulates the non-monotonic dependence of transcriptionin vitrowith the superhelical density of the plasmid template. Simulations ofin vivotranscription in a closed domain exhibit a qualitatively different role for the two topoisomerases, as well as qualitatively different regulatory behaviors depending on the promoter strength. Specifically, topoisomerase I is required for strongly expressed genes that may be hindered by stalled RNA Polymerase, whereas gyrase activity favors the expression of all genes by enhancing transcription initiation and modulating the burstiness of transcription. The simulations exhibit a new mechanism for transcription bursting mediated by negative SC accumulating at the promoter region and modulating the initiation rate, resulting in levels of burstiness compatible with values reported in cells. Finally, we analyze several transcriptomics datasets from a range of evolutionarily distant species and show that topoisomerase inhibition is systematically associated with the repression of highly expressed genes. Simulations show this behavior to occur within a limited parameter range and thus indicate a biologically relevant regime for the simulations. Overall, this work provides a more quantitative description of how SC contributes to differential gene regulation and transcriptional bursting in bacteria.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 超螺旋对拓扑结构域中细菌转录的差异性影响
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: DNA超螺旋（SC），即DNA的过度和欠度缠绕，根据双域模型，由转录过程产生。反之，SC也通过扭转应力影响转录。因此，SC动态地调控转录，且独立于转录因子结合，尤其是在细菌染色体拓扑结构域和拓扑异构酶活性的背景下。在这项工作中，我们基于一个结合了随机转录以及拓扑异构酶I和旋转酶活性的模型，开发了拓扑结构域内单个基因SC耦合转录的数值模拟。我们探讨了先前工作中未系统评估的几个参数（拓扑异构酶活性的作用、拓扑结构域大小、基因表达强度）的影响，并将模拟结果与从体外转录实验到不同物种转录组数据集的各种实验观察结果进行了比较。该模型再现了体外转录对质粒模板超螺旋密度非单调依赖性。封闭域内体内转录的模拟显示，两种拓扑异构酶的作用存在质的差异，并且根据启动子强度，调控行为也存在质的差异。具体而言，拓扑异构酶I对于可能被停滞的RNA聚合酶阻碍的强表达基因是必需的，而旋转酶活性通过增强转录起始和调节转录的爆发性来促进所有基因的表达。模拟揭示了一种新的转录爆发机制，该机制由在启动子区域积累的负SC介导并调节起始速率，从而产生与细胞中报道值相符的爆发性水平。最后，我们分析了来自一系列进化上远缘物种的多个转录组数据集，并表明拓扑异构酶抑制系统性地与高表达基因的抑制相关。模拟表明这种行为发生在有限的参数范围内，从而为模拟指明了一个生物学相关的区域。总之，这项工作更定量地描述了SC如何促进细菌中差异基因调控和转录爆发。

Cancer.title: YTHDF2 regulates self non-coding RNA metabolism to control inflammation and tumorigenesis
Cancer.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64898-7RNA modifications influence gene regulation and disease. Here, the authors show that YTHDF2 recognizes m6A-modified U6 snRNA to prevent aberrant TLR3 activation to inhibit inflammation and skin cancer development.
Cancer.abstract: The role of m6A RNA methylation of self non-coding RNA remains poorly understood. Here we show that m6A-methylated self U6 snRNA is recognized by YTHDF2 to reduce its stability and prevent its binding to Toll-like receptor 3 (TLR3), leading to decreased inflammatory responses in human and mouse cells and mouse models. At the molecular level, endosomal U6 snRNA binds to the LRR21 domain in TLR3, independent of m6A methylation, to activate inflammatory gene expression, a mechanism that is distinct from that of the best known synthetic TLR3 agonist poly I:C. Both U6 snRNA and YTHDF2 are localized to endosomes via the transmembrane protein SIDT2, where YTHDF2 functions to prevent the U6-TLR3 interaction. We further show that UVB exposure inhibits YTHDF2 by inducing its dephosphorylation and autophagic protein degradation in human keratinocytes and mouse skin. Skin-specific deletion of Ythdf2 in mice enhanced the UVB-induced skin inflammatory response and promoted tumor initiation. Taken together, our findings demonstrate that YTHDF2 plays a crucial role in controlling inflammation by inhibiting m6A U6-mediated TLR3 activation, suggesting that YTHDF2 and m6A U6 are potential therapeutic targets for preventing and treating inflammation and tumorigenesis. RNA modifications influence gene regulation and disease. Here, the authors show that YTHDF2 recognizes m6A-modified U6 snRNA to prevent aberrant TLR3 activation to inhibit inflammation and skin cancer development.

Cancer.title_cn: YTHDF2调控自身非编码RNA代谢以控制炎症和肿瘤发生
Cancer.abstract_cn: 自身非编码RNA的m6A RNA甲基化作用机制仍不清楚。本研究表明，m6A甲基化的自身U6 snRNA被YTHDF2识别，从而降低其稳定性并阻止其与Toll样受体3 (TLR3)结合，进而导致人源和鼠源细胞以及小鼠模型中炎症反应的减弱。在分子水平上，内体U6 snRNA独立于m6A甲基化，与TLR3中的LRR21结构域结合，从而激活炎症基因表达，这一机制与最著名的合成TLR3激动剂poly I:C的机制不同。U6 snRNA和YTHDF2均通过跨膜蛋白SIDT2定位于内体，YTHDF2在此处发挥作用以阻止U6-TLR3的相互作用。我们进一步发现，在人角质形成细胞和小鼠皮肤中，UVB暴露通过诱导YTHDF2的去磷酸化和自噬蛋白降解来抑制YTHDF2。小鼠中皮肤特异性敲除Ythdf2增强了UVB诱导的皮肤炎症反应并促进了肿瘤的发生。综上所述，我们的研究结果表明，YTHDF2通过抑制m6A U6介导的TLR3激活在控制炎症中发挥关键作用，这提示YTHDF2和m6A U6是预防和治疗炎症及肿瘤发生的潜在治疗靶点。RNA修饰影响基因调控和疾病。本文作者展示了YTHDF2识别m6A修饰的U6 snRNA，从而阻止异常TLR3激活，以抑制炎症和皮肤癌的发生发展。

Cancer.title: A composite motif in calcimembrin/C16orf74 dictates multimeric dephosphorylation by calcineurin
Cancer.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64884-zC16orf74/ calcimembrin (CLMB), a lipidated microprotein with roles in cancer, targets the calcineurin phosphatase to membranes. Here, authors show how CLMB uses a composite motif to form multimeric complexes with calcineurin that are required for dephosphorylation.
Cancer.abstract: Calcineurin, the Ca2+/calmodulin-activated protein phosphatase, recognizes substrates and regulators via short linear motifs, PxIxIT and LxVP, which dock to distinct sites on calcineurin to determine enzyme distribution and catalysis, respectively. Calcimembrin/C16orf74 (CLMB), an intrinsically disordered microprotein whose expression correlates with poor cancer outcomes, targets calcineurin to membranes where it may promote oncogenesis by shaping calcineurin signaling. We show that CLMB associates with membranes via lipidation, i.e., N-myristoylation and reversible S-acylation. Furthermore, CLMB contains an unusual composite ‘LxVPxIxIT’ motif, that binds the PxIxIT-docking site on calcineurin with extraordinarily high affinity when phosphorylated, 33LDVPDIIITPP(p)T44. Calcineurin dephosphorylates CLMB to decrease this affinity, but Thr44 is protected from dephosphorylation when PxIxIT-bound. We propose that CLMB is dephosphorylated in multimeric complexes, where one PxIxIT-bound CLMB recruits calcineurin to membranes, allowing a second CLMB to engage via its LxVP motif to be dephosphorylated. In vivo and in vitro data, including nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) analyses of CLMB-calcineurin complexes, support this model. Thus, CLMB with its composite motif imposes distinct properties to calcineurin signaling at membranes including sensitivity to CLMB:calcineurin ratios, CLMB phosphorylation and dynamic S-acylation. C16orf74/ calcimembrin (CLMB), a lipidated microprotein with roles in cancer, targets the calcineurin phosphatase to membranes. Here, authors show how CLMB uses a composite motif to form multimeric complexes with calcineurin that are required for dephosphorylation.

Cancer.title_cn: 钙膜蛋白/C16orf74中的复合基序决定钙调磷酸酶介导的多聚体去磷酸化
Cancer.abstract_cn: 钙调磷酸酶是一种Ca2+/钙调素激活的蛋白磷酸酶，它通过短线性基序PxIxIT和LxVP识别底物和调节因子。这些基序分别停靠在钙调磷酸酶的不同位点，以决定酶的分布和催化活性。钙膜蛋白/C16orf74 (CLMB) 是一种内源性无序微蛋白，其表达与不良癌症预后相关。CLMB将钙调磷酸酶靶向膜，可能通过影响钙调磷酸酶信号传导来促进肿瘤发生。本研究表明，CLMB通过脂化作用（即N-肉豆蔻酰化和可逆S-酰化）与膜结合。此外，CLMB含有一个不寻常的复合“LxVPxIxIT”基序，当其磷酸化时（33LDVPDIIITPP(p)T44），能以极高的亲和力结合钙调磷酸酶上的PxIxIT停靠位点。钙调磷酸酶对CLMB进行去磷酸化以降低这种亲和力，但当PxIxIT结合时，Thr44受到保护，免于去磷酸化。我们提出，CLMB在多聚体复合物中被去磷酸化，其中一个结合PxIxIT的CLMB将钙调磷酸酶招募到膜上，从而允许第二个CLMB通过其LxVP基序结合并被去磷酸化。体内外数据，包括CLMB-钙调磷酸酶复合物的核磁共振（NMR）分析，均支持这一模型。因此，CLMB及其复合基序赋予膜上钙调磷酸酶信号传导独特的特性，包括对CLMB:钙调磷酸酶比例、CLMB磷酸化和动态S-酰化的敏感性。钙膜蛋白/C16orf74 (CLMB) 是一种与癌症相关的脂化微蛋白，它将钙调磷酸酶靶向膜。本文作者展示了CLMB如何利用复合基序与钙调磷酸酶形成多聚体复合物，而这些复合物是去磷酸化所必需的。

Cancer.title: IPScan: Detecting novel intronic PolyAdenylation events with RNA-seq data
Cancer.summary: by Naima Ahmed Fahmi, Sze Cheng, Jeovani Overstreet, Qianqian Song, Jeongsik Yong, Wei ZhangIntronic PolyAdenylation (IPA) is an important post-transcriptional mechanism that can alter transcript coding potential by truncating translation regions, thereby increasing transcriptome and proteome diversity. This process generates novel protein isoforms with altered peptide sequences, some of which are implicated in disease progression, including cancer. Truncated proteins may lose tumor-suppressive functions, contributing to oncogenesis. Despite advancements in Alternative PolyAdenylation (APA) analysis using RNA-seq, detecting and quantifying novel IPA events remains challenging. To address this, we developed IPScan, a computational pipeline for precise IPA event identification, quantification, and visualization. IPScan has been benchmarked against existing methods using simulated data, different human and mouse cell lines, and TCGA (The Cancer Genome Atlas) breast cancer datasets. Differential IPA events under different biological conditions were quantified and validated via qPCR.

Cancer.title_cn: IPScan：基于RNA测序数据检测新型内含子多聚腺苷酸化事件
Cancer.abstract_cn: 内含子多聚腺苷酸化（IPA）是一种重要的转录后机制，它通过截短翻译区域来改变转录本的编码潜力，从而增加转录组和蛋白质组的多样性。这一过程产生具有改变肽序列的新型蛋白质异构体，其中一些与疾病进展（包括癌症）有关。截短的蛋白质可能丧失肿瘤抑制功能，从而促进肿瘤发生。尽管利用RNA测序进行选择性多聚腺苷酸化（APA）分析取得了进展，但检测和量化新型IPA事件仍然具有挑战性。为解决此问题，我们开发了IPScan，这是一个用于精确识别、量化和可视化IPA事件的计算流程。IPScan已通过模拟数据、不同人鼠细胞系以及TCGA（癌症基因组图谱）乳腺癌数据集与现有方法进行了基准测试。在不同生物学条件下，差异IPA事件通过qPCR进行了量化和验证。

Structure.title: Heteroaromatic π-stacking engineered near-infrared absorption for highly stable near-zero transmittance electrochromic window
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64955-1Electrochromic materials have been used in thermal management systems though it is challenging due to limited NIR and long-term instability. Here the authors design an electrochromic organogel for stable electrochromic windows.
Structure.abstract: Electrochromic (EC) devices based on structurally designable and color-tunable EC molecules can dynamically regulate light-heat transmittance via the charge-transfer mechanism, yet face challenges of limited near-infrared (NIR) absorption, long-term instability, and restricted modulation modes. Here, we show that π-stacking of heteroaromatic tri-pyridine molecules with a 1,3,5-triazine core (H-TriPy) enhances molecular conjugation, significantly augments NIR absorption, and enables dual-band modulation with improved visual comfort. The three pyridine-based redox centers facilitate multi-step electron transfer, enabling multi-modal EC regulation, including bright, cool, and dark modes. Incorporation of a fluorinated ionic liquid into EC organogels inhibits irreversible π-stacking of high-concentration H-TriPy. Consequently, H-TriPy-based EC devices achieve neutral-colored states with near-zero transmittance as low as 3.7% in both visible and NIR ranges and maintain high switching stability of over 89.1% retention after 100,000 cycles. Furthermore, large-area EC devices exhibit uniform tinting and reliable stability, underscoring their potential for energy-efficient green buildings. Electrochromic materials have been used in thermal management systems though it is challenging due to limited NIR and long-term instability. Here the authors design an electrochromic organogel for stable electrochromic windows.

Structure.title_cn: 杂芳香π-堆叠工程化近红外吸收，实现高稳定性近零透射电致变色窗
Structure.abstract_cn: 基于结构可设计和颜色可调的电致变色（EC）分子，EC器件能够通过电荷转移机制动态调节光热透射率。然而，它们面临近红外（NIR）吸收有限、长期不稳定性以及调制模式受限等挑战。在此，我们展示了具有1,3,5-三嗪核心的杂芳香三吡啶分子（H-TriPy）的π-堆叠能够增强分子共轭，显著提高近红外吸收，并实现具有改善视觉舒适度的双波段调制。三个基于吡啶的氧化还原中心促进了多步电子转移，从而实现了多模式EC调控，包括明亮、凉爽和黑暗模式。将氟化离子液体引入EC有机凝胶中，可以抑制高浓度H-TriPy的不可逆π-堆叠。因此，基于H-TriPy的EC器件在可见光和近红外波段均实现了近零透射率（低至3.7%）的无色状态，并在100,000次循环后保持了超过89.1%的高开关稳定性。此外，大面积EC器件表现出均匀的着色和可靠的稳定性，凸显了其在节能绿色建筑中的应用潜力。尽管电致变色材料已被用于热管理系统，但其有限的近红外吸收和长期不稳定性带来了挑战。本文作者设计了一种用于稳定电致变色窗的电致变色有机凝胶。

Structure.title: Achieving electrochemical and mechanical stability in a lightweight titanium alloy
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64875-0Seawater corrosion can impact the lifespan and reliability of metallic materials for marine applications. This work develops a titanium alloy exhibiting active passivation behavior that ensures its electrochemical and mechanical stability in seawater-like environments.
Structure.abstract: Titanium alloys represent a promising material in marine applications, focusing on high-stakes environments where their corrosion resistance and high specific strength offer significant benefits. However, they can still be vulnerable to localized corrosion, such as pitting corrosion and stress corrosion cracking, in the presence of aggressive chlorides. Here we report a lightweight titanium alloy that addresses these issues through conventional casting and thermal-mechanical processing. The alloy can generate a passive film showing distinct but stable electrochemical responses. It is found that the reaction of the passive film can shift from the slow accumulation in the passive region, to the rapid buildup of passive layers in extreme anodic potentials. Consequently, the alloy exhibits a pitting potential above 10 VSCE without being subjected to localized corrosion. Meanwhile, mechanical reliability is also achieved during stress corrosion tests, owing to the fast repair of the passive film that substantially constrains the crack propagation. Such virtual immunity to seawater corrosion qualifies this titanium alloy as a potential candidate for long-term cost savings and sustainability. Seawater corrosion can impact the lifespan and reliability of metallic materials for marine applications. This work develops a titanium alloy exhibiting active passivation behavior that ensures its electrochemical and mechanical stability in seawater-like environments.

Structure.title_cn: 实现轻质钛合金的电化学与机械稳定性
Structure.abstract_cn: 钛合金在海洋应用中是一种极具前景的材料，尤其是在高风险环境中，其优异的耐腐蚀性和高比强度能带来显著优势。然而，在侵蚀性氯化物存在下，钛合金仍易受到局部腐蚀，例如点蚀和应力腐蚀开裂。本文报道了一种轻质钛合金，通过常规铸造和热机械加工解决了这些问题。该合金能形成一种钝化膜，表现出独特而稳定的电化学响应。研究发现，钝化膜的反应可以从钝化区缓慢积累转变为在极端阳极电位下快速形成钝化层。因此，该合金表现出高于10 VSCE的点蚀电位，且未发生局部腐蚀。同时，在应力腐蚀测试中也实现了机械可靠性，这归因于钝化膜的快速修复，其显著抑制了裂纹扩展。这种对海水腐蚀的“虚拟免疫”使该钛合金成为实现长期成本节约和可持续发展的潜在候选材料。海水腐蚀会影响海洋应用中金属材料的使用寿命和可靠性。本工作开发了一种具有主动钝化行为的钛合金，确保了其在类海水环境中的电化学和机械稳定性。

Structure.title: A combined biochemical and computational approach provides evidence for membrane remodelling by the structural scaffold of the endocytic TPLATE complex
Structure.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02146-yThe manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.
Structure.abstract: Eukaryotic cells maintain homeostasis of their outer membrane by controlled internalization of lipid and protein constituents via endocytosis. Endocytosis is evolutionary conserved and uses similarly folded domains. How these structural folds are combined into proteins and protein complexes, however, differs between eukaryotic kingdoms. The TPLATE complex (TPC) in plants is an evolutionary ancient protein module that combines several protein domains with a conserved role in endocytosis into a single octameric protein complex. Its molecular architecture, lipid-nucleated condensate formation and requirement for clathrin cage curvature revealed its function in endocytosis initiation in plants. Mechanistic understanding of how this complex drives membrane deformation during plant endocytosis is, however, lacking. Here we used an integrative structural approach to obtain a precise molecular structure of the TPC of Arabidopsis thaliana. In addition, our approach allowed visualizing the structural flexibility that hallmarks this enigmatic complex. We prove that the intrinsic structural flexibility is required for its functionality and membrane recruitment. The membrane-binding interface consists of several domains with differential lipid preferences. Finally, we demonstrate via molecular dynamics simulations that the crescent shape of the structured part of the complex is sufficient for membrane curvature generation. Our mechanistic insight, obtained by a combined biochemical and computational approach, shows that the structured part of the TPC likely contributes to the execution of plant endocytosis, which does not depend on cytoskeletal-based force generation. The manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.

Structure.title_cn: 结合生化与计算方法揭示内吞TPLATE复合体结构支架介导的膜重塑
Structure.abstract_cn: 真核细胞通过内吞作用受控地内化脂质和蛋白质组分，从而维持其外膜的稳态。内吞作用在进化上是保守的，并利用相似折叠的结构域。然而，这些结构折叠如何组合成蛋白质和蛋白质复合体，在不同真核生物界之间存在差异。植物中的TPLATE复合体（TPC）是一个进化上古老的蛋白质模块，它将多个在内吞作用中具有保守作用的蛋白质结构域组合成一个单一的八聚体蛋白质复合体。它的分子结构、脂质诱导的凝聚物形成以及对网格蛋白笼曲率的需求揭示了其在植物内吞起始中的功能。然而，关于该复合体如何在植物内吞过程中驱动膜变形的机制理解仍然缺乏。在本研究中，我们采用了一种整合结构方法，获得了拟南芥TPC的精确分子结构。此外，我们的方法还能够可视化该神秘复合体所特有的结构柔性。我们证明了其固有的结构柔性对其功能和膜招募是必需的。其膜结合界面由多个具有不同脂质偏好的结构域组成。最后，我们通过分子动力学模拟证明，该复合体结构化部分的月牙形足以产生膜曲率。我们通过结合生化与计算方法获得的机制洞察表明，TPC的结构化部分可能有助于植物内吞作用的执行，且该过程不依赖于细胞骨架产生的力。本文采用整合方法，构建了多亚基内吞TPLATE复合体的全面结构，并研究了其膜靶向及其在植物内吞起始阶段膜变形中的作用。

Structure.title: Structural basis of G6P/Pi transport and inhibition in SLC37A4
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01711-5Zhou et al. report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four states, elucidating conformational transitions during glucose-6-phosphate/phosphate transport and S-4048 inhibition. This study links structural mechanisms to glycogen storage disease type Ib pathology, offering therapeutic insights.
Structure.abstract: Glycogen storage disease type Ib (GSD-Ib), caused by loss-of-function mutations in the endoplasmic reticulum transporter SLC37A4, disrupts glucose homeostasis through impaired glucose-6-phosphate (G6P)/phosphate (Pi) antiport. Despite its central role in glycogen metabolism and immune regulation, the structural mechanisms governing SLC37A4’s transport cycle and pathological dysfunction remain elusive. Here we report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four functional states, capturing conformational transitions between lumen-facing and cytoplasm-facing states. Combined with mutational analysis, molecular dynamics simulations and functional assays, we identify a conserved substrate-binding pocket that alternately accommodates G6P and Pi through electrostatic complementarity and domain-dependent interactions. We further demonstrate that the high-affinity inhibitor S-4048 sterically occludes the cytoplasmic entry pathway by trapping the transporter in a cytoplasm-facing conformation. Our work elucidates the molecular pathology of GSD-Ib-linked mutations and provides a structural framework for developing therapies targeting this transporter in metabolic diseases. This study links structural mechanisms to glycogen storage disease type Ib pathology, offering therapeutic insights.

Structure.title_cn: SLC37A4中G6P/Pi转运及其抑制的结构基础
Structure.abstract_cn: 糖原贮积病Ib型（GSD-Ib）是由内质网转运蛋白SLC37A4的功能缺失突变引起的，通过葡萄糖-6-磷酸（G6P）/磷酸（Pi）逆向转运受损，从而扰乱葡萄糖稳态。尽管SLC37A4在糖原代谢和免疫调节中发挥核心作用，但其转运循环和病理功能障碍的结构机制仍不清楚。本研究报道了人源SLC37A4在四种功能状态下的冷冻电镜结构，捕获了其在腔面朝向和胞质面朝向状态之间的构象转变。结合突变分析、分子动力学模拟和功能测定，我们鉴定了一个保守的底物结合口袋，该口袋通过静电互补和结构域依赖性相互作用交替结合G6P和Pi。我们进一步证明，高亲和力抑制剂S-4048通过将转运蛋白捕获在胞质面朝向的构象中，从而空间性地阻断了胞质进入途径。我们的工作阐明了GSD-Ib相关突变的分子病理学，并为开发针对代谢疾病中该转运蛋白的治疗方法提供了结构框架。

Structure.title: Structural basis of glucose-6-phosphate transport by human SLC37A2
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01712-4Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.
Structure.abstract: Glucose-6-phosphate (G6P) transporters are crucial for glucose metabolism by mediating G6P transport from the cytoplasm to endoplasmic reticulum (ER). However, their transport mechanisms remain poorly understood. Here, we elucidate the structural and functional basis of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 (SLC37A2), a G6P transporter implicated in metabolic regulation and macrophage inflammation. We show that SLC37A2 functions as a uniporter, facilitating G6P transport independent of inorganic phosphate gradients. Structures of SLC37A2 in the apo and G6P-bound states reveal a dimeric architecture. Both the ER luminal-open and cytosolic-open structures are captured, showing the structural dynamics during G6P transport. G6P is coordinated by SLC37A2 through interactions with its phosphate and hydroxyl groups. Furthermore, mapping mutations associated with glycogen storage disease type Ib onto SLC37A2 highlights residues essential for transport activity. Together, this work provides structural insights into G6P transport and establishes a framework for understanding related metabolic disorders. Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.

Structure.title_cn: 人源SLC37A2介导葡萄糖-6-磷酸转运的结构基础
Structure.abstract_cn: 葡萄糖-6-磷酸 (G6P) 转运蛋白通过介导G6P从细胞质向内质网 (ER) 的转运，在葡萄糖代谢中发挥关键作用。然而，其转运机制仍不清楚。本研究阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2 (SLC37A2) 的结构和功能基础，SLC37A2是一种与代谢调节和巨噬细胞炎症相关的G6P转运蛋白。我们发现SLC37A2作为一种单向转运蛋白发挥作用，促进G6P转运，且不依赖于无机磷酸梯度。SLC37A2在脱辅基和G6P结合状态下的结构揭示了其二聚体构象。我们捕获了内质网腔开放和胞质开放两种构象，展示了G6P转运过程中的结构动态变化。G6P通过与SLC37A2的磷酸基团和羟基相互作用而被其协调。此外，将与糖原贮积病Ib型相关的突变映射到SLC37A2上，突出了对转运活性至关重要的残基。总而言之，这项工作为G6P转运提供了结构见解，并为理解相关代谢紊乱建立了框架。赖和徐等人利用冷冻电镜和功能分析阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2的葡萄糖-6-磷酸单向转运机制及其结构动态，为葡萄糖代谢和相关疾病提供了深入见解。

Structure.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
Structure.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

Structure.title_cn: AlphaSync：一个与UniProt同步的增强型AlphaFold结构数据库
Structure.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构的准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质和异构体的预测。AlphaSync为42个物种（包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物）实现了完整且最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将有助于蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模且详细地进行蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

Structure.title: Zero-shot segmentation using embeddings from a protein language model identifies functional regions in the human proteome
Structure.summary: by Ami G. Sangster, Cameron Dufault, Haoning Qu, Denise Le, Julie D. Forman-Kay, Alan M. MosesThe biological function of a protein is often determined by its distinct functional units, such as folded domains and intrinsically disordered regions. Identifying and categorizing these protein segments from sequence has been a major focus in computational biology which has enabled the automatic annotation of folded protein domains. Here we show that embeddings from the unsupervised protein language model ProtT5 can be used to identify and categorize protein segments without relying on conserved patterns in primary amino acid sequence. We present Zero-shot Protein Segmentation (ZPS), where we use embeddings from ProtT5 to predict the boundaries of protein segments without training or fine-tuning any parameters. We find that ZPS boundary predictions for the human proteome are better at reproducing reviewed annotations from UniProt than established bioinformatics tools and ProtT5 embeddings of ZPS segments can categorize over 200 of the most common UniProt annotations in the human proteome, including folded domains, sub-domains, and intrinsically disordered regions. To explore ZPS predictions, we introduce a new way to visualize protein embeddings that closely resembles diagrams of distinct functional units in protein biology. Since ZPS and segment embeddings can be used without training or fine-tuning, the approach is not biased towards known annotations and can be used to identify and categorize unannotated protein segments. We used the segment embeddings to identify unannotated mitochondrion targeting signals and SYGQ-rich prion-like domains, which are functional regions within intrinsically disordered regions. We expect that the analysis of protein segment embedding similarity can lead to valuable information about protein function, including about intrinsically disordered regions and poorly understood protein regions.

Structure.title_cn: 利用蛋白质语言模型嵌入的零样本分割识别人类蛋白质组中的功能区域
Structure.abstract_cn: 蛋白质的生物学功能通常由其独特的结构单元决定，例如折叠结构域和内在无序区域。从序列中识别和分类这些蛋白质片段一直是计算生物学的一个主要焦点，这使得折叠蛋白质结构域的自动注释成为可能。在此，我们展示了来自无监督蛋白质语言模型ProtT5的嵌入可以用于识别和分类蛋白质片段，而无需依赖一级氨基酸序列中的保守模式。我们提出了零样本蛋白质分割（ZPS）方法，该方法利用ProtT5的嵌入来预测蛋白质片段的边界，无需进行任何参数的训练或微调。我们发现，ZPS对人类蛋白质组的边界预测在重现UniProt中经过评审的注释方面优于已有的生物信息学工具，并且ZPS片段的ProtT5嵌入可以对人类蛋白质组中200多种最常见的UniProt注释进行分类，包括折叠结构域、亚结构域和内在无序区域。为了探索ZPS的预测结果，我们引入了一种新的蛋白质嵌入可视化方法，该方法与蛋白质生物学中独特的结构单元图示非常相似。由于ZPS和片段嵌入无需训练或微调即可使用，因此该方法不会偏向于已知注释，并且可用于识别和分类未注释的蛋白质片段。我们利用这些片段嵌入识别了未注释的线粒体靶向信号和富含SYGQ的朊病毒样结构域，这些都是内在无序区域内的功能区域。我们预计，蛋白质片段嵌入相似性的分析可以为蛋白质功能提供有价值的信息，包括内在无序区域和了解不足的蛋白质区域。

Bioengineering.title: A parts list of promoters and gRNA scaffolds for mammalian genome engineering and molecular recording
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02896-2Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.
Bioengineering.abstract: A standardized ‘parts list’ of sequences for genetic engineering of microbes has been indispensable to progress in synthetic biology, but few analogous parts exist for mammalian systems. Here we design libraries of extant, ancestral, mutagenized or miniaturized variants of polymerase III promoters and guide RNA (gRNA) scaffolds and quantify their abilities to mediate precise edits to the mammalian genome through multiplex prime editing. We identify thousands of parts for reproducible editing in human and mouse cell lines, including hundreds with greater activity than commonly used sequences. Saturation mutagenesis screens identify tolerated sequence variants that further enhance sequence diversity. In an application to molecular recording, we design a ‘ten key’ array that, in mammalian cells, achieves balanced activity of pegRNAs as predicted by the activity of the component parts. The data reported here will aid the design of synthetic loci encoding arrays of gRNAs exhibiting predictable, differentiated levels of activity for applications in multiplexed perturbation, biological recorders and complex genetic circuits. Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.
Bioengineering.authors_short: McDiarmid, Troy A. et al., Shendure, Jay
Bioengineering.title_cn: 用于哺乳动物基因组工程和分子记录的启动子和gRNA骨架元件库
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 微生物基因工程的标准化“元件库”对合成生物学的发展至关重要，但哺乳动物系统中类似的元件却很少。本研究设计了聚合酶III启动子和引导RNA (gRNA) 骨架的现有、祖先、诱变或微型化变体的文库，并量化了它们通过多重先导编辑（multiplex prime editing）介导哺乳动物基因组精确编辑的能力。我们鉴定了数千个可在人源和鼠源细胞系中实现可重复编辑的元件，其中数百个元件的活性高于常用序列。饱和诱变筛选识别出可耐受的序列变体，这些变体进一步增强了序列多样性。在分子记录的应用中，我们设计了一个“十键”阵列，该阵列在哺乳动物细胞中实现了pegRNA的平衡活性，这与组成元件的活性预测一致。本研究报告的数据将有助于设计合成基因座，这些基因座编码的gRNA阵列在多重扰动、生物记录器和复杂遗传回路等应用中表现出可预测的、差异化的活性水平。哺乳动物细胞中的先导编辑受益于全面的遗传元件清单。

Bioengineering.title: Regulation of corneal stromal cell behavior by modulating curvature using a hydraulically-controlled organ chip array
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64889-8Kim and colleagues propose a curvature-controlled organ chip array to monitor how geometric stress drives corneal disease progression. The authors show that geometric stress triggers cellular changes that replicate keratoconus pathology and they identify dysregulated molecular pathways for potential therapeutic approaches.
Bioengineering.abstract: Corneal curvature abnormalities drive ectatic diseases, yet their mechanobiological effects on stromal cells remain poorly understood. We developed a hydraulically controlled curvature array chip recapitulating disease-relevant geometries (33-56D) to investigate how keratocytes, fibroblasts, and myofibroblasts respond to geometric stress. Curvature-induced mechanical stress triggered dramatic cellular remodeling keratocytes exhibited significant proliferative enhancement and phenotypic transformation with ALDH3A1 downregulation and α-SMA upregulation, indicating mechanobiologically driven fibrotic activation. Fibroblasts developed curvature-dependent orthogonal alignment that recapitulates native corneal lamellar organization without chemical cues, while myofibroblasts showed enhanced contractile responses. RNA sequencing revealed that geometric stress activates identical molecular pathways dysregulated in keratoconus, including TGF-β/SMAD signaling, ECM-receptor interactions, and inflammatory cascades. Extracellular matrix remodeling was cell-type specific, with keratocytes showing homeostatic control loss, fibroblasts promoting matrix deposition, and myofibroblasts driving degradation. These findings establish curvature-induced mechanotransduction as the fundamental driver of corneal ectatic disease progression, repositioning geometric stress from a passive consequence to an active determinant of pathology. Kim and colleagues propose a curvature-controlled organ chip array to monitor how geometric stress drives corneal disease progression. The authors show that geometric stress triggers cellular changes that replicate keratoconus pathology and they identify dysregulated molecular pathways for potential therapeutic approaches.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Kim, Minju et al., Kim, Jungkyu
Bioengineering.title_cn: 利用水力控制的器官芯片阵列通过调节曲率来调控角膜基质细胞行为
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 角膜曲率异常是导致角膜扩张性疾病的原因，但其对基质细胞的机械生物学效应仍知之甚少。我们开发了一种水力控制的曲率阵列芯片，该芯片能够重现与疾病相关的几何形状（33-56D），以研究角膜细胞、成纤维细胞和肌成纤维细胞如何响应几何应力。曲率诱导的机械应力触发了显著的细胞重塑：角膜细胞表现出显著的增殖增强和表型转化，伴随着ALDH3A1下调和α-SMA上调，这表明机械生物学驱动的纤维化激活。成纤维细胞形成了曲率依赖性的正交排列，在没有化学信号的情况下重现了天然角膜板层结构，而肌成纤维细胞则表现出增强的收缩反应。RNA测序显示，几何应力激活了圆锥角膜中失调的相同分子通路，包括TGF-β/SMAD信号、ECM-受体相互作用和炎症级联反应。细胞外基质重塑具有细胞类型特异性：角膜细胞表现出稳态控制丧失，成纤维细胞促进基质沉积，而肌成纤维细胞则驱动降解。这些发现确立了曲率诱导的机械转导是角膜扩张性疾病进展的基本驱动因素，将几何应力从被动结果重新定位为病理学的主动决定因素。Kim及其同事提出了一种曲率控制的器官芯片阵列，用于监测几何应力如何驱动角膜疾病进展。作者表明，几何应力触发的细胞变化复制了圆锥角膜的病理学特征，并确定了可能用于治疗方法的失调分子通路。

Bioengineering.title: Human organoids as 3D in vitro platforms for drug discovery: opportunities and challenges
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Reviews Drug Discovery, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41573-025-01317-yHuman organoids provide physiologically relevant, 3D models for studying disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. This Review examines organoid generation methods, applications in preclinical drug discovery, and the regulatory and practical challenges that must be addressed for their integration into development pipelines.
Bioengineering.abstract: Organoids are 3D structures derived from stem cells that recapitulate key architectural and functional aspects of the corresponding tissue. Compared with conventional 2D cell lines, human organoids provide experimental models that more closely reflect human physiology. Their ability to capture the complexity and heterogeneity of human tissues enables the study of disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. When generated from patient material, organoids also allow the assessment of individual drug responses. In this Review, we explore the utility of organoids in drug discovery. We outline current methodologies for generating and maintaining organoids, examine their applications in disease modelling, drug screening and safety evaluation, and consider regulatory aspects and the challenges for their broader adoption in drug discovery. Human organoids provide physiologically relevant, 3D models for studying disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. This Review examines organoid generation methods, applications in preclinical drug discovery, and the regulatory and practical challenges that must be addressed for their integration into development pipelines.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Wang, Daisong et al., Clevers, Hans
Bioengineering.title_cn: 人体类器官作为药物发现的三维体外平台：机遇与挑战
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 类器官是源自干细胞的三维结构，能够重现相应组织的关键结构和功能特征。与传统的二维细胞系相比，人体类器官提供了更接近人类生理学的实验模型。它们能够捕捉人体组织的复杂性和异质性，从而有助于疾病机制、药物疗效和毒性的研究。当从患者材料生成时，类器官还可用于评估个体药物反应。本综述探讨了类器官在药物发现中的应用价值。我们概述了当前类器官的生成和维持方法，考察了它们在疾病建模、药物筛选和安全性评估中的应用，并讨论了其在药物发现中更广泛采用所面临的监管问题和挑战。人体类器官为研究疾病机制、药物疗效和毒性提供了生理学相关的三维模型。本综述审视了类器官的生成方法、在临床前药物发现中的应用，以及为将其整合到开发流程中必须解决的监管和实践挑战。

Neuroscience.title: Digital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Neuroscience.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00596-wDigital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Neuroscience.abstract: The development of effective interventions for neurodegenerative disorders, such as posterior cortical atrophy (a visual Alzheimer’s variant), remains to be a significant clinical challenge. We introduce a computational framework using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as in silico models to simulate visual system degeneration and evaluate intervention strategies. By modeling controlled synaptic decay and comparing three distinct retraining approaches, random data (control), accuracy-based, and entropy-based, we assess impacts on classification performance and neural representation geometry. Our results demonstrate that accuracy-based retraining outperformed other strategies, maintaining model performance and preserving optimal manifold geometry during intermediate degeneration stages. This computational analysis supports prioritizing accuracy-targeted interventions for cognitive compensation. Our framework enables rapid evaluation of intervention efficacy while elucidating computational principles underlying neurodegeneration and recovery. This approach offers a platform for refining strategies to slow visual-cognitive decline in neurodegenerative diseases, bridging mechanistic insights with clinical translation.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 数字模拟痴呆与退化神经网络认知干预策略的评估
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 神经退行性疾病（如后皮层萎缩，一种视觉型阿尔茨海默病变体）有效干预措施的开发，仍然是一个重大的临床挑战。我们引入了一个计算框架，该框架利用卷积神经网络（CNNs）作为计算机模拟模型，以模拟视觉系统退化并评估干预策略。通过模拟受控的突触衰减，并比较三种不同的再训练方法——随机数据（对照）、基于准确性以及基于熵的方法，我们评估了它们对分类性能和神经表征几何结构的影响。我们的结果表明，在中间退化阶段，基于准确性的再训练优于其他策略，能够保持模型性能并保留最佳流形几何结构。这项计算分析支持优先采用以准确性为目标的干预措施进行认知补偿。我们的框架能够快速评估干预措施的有效性，同时阐明神经退行性变和恢复背后的计算原理。这种方法为完善减缓神经退行性疾病中视觉-认知衰退的策略提供了一个平台，将机制洞察与临床转化相结合。

Neuroscience.title: Individual trajectories for recovery of neocortical activity in disorders of consciousness
Neuroscience.summary: by Prejaas K. B. Tewarie, Romesh Abeysuriya, Rajanikant Panda, Pablo Nùñez, Marie M. Vitello, Glenn van der Lande, Olivia Gosseries, Aurore Thibaut, Steven Laureys, Gustavo Deco, Jitka AnnenThe evolution from disturbed brain activity to physiological brain rhythms can precede recovery in patients with disorders of consciousness (DoC). Accordingly, intriguing questions arise: What are the pathophysiological factors associated to disrupted brain rhythms in patients with DoC, and are there potential pathways for individual patients with DoC to return to normal brain rhythms? We addressed these questions at the individual subject level using biophysical simulations based on electroencephalography (EEG). The main findings are that unconscious patients exhibit a loss of excitatory corticothalamic synaptic strength. Synaptic plasticity in this excitatory corticothalamic circuitry facilitates the return of physiological brain rhythms, characterized by the reappearance of spectral peaks and flattening of the aperiodic (1/f) component of the power spectrum, in the selection of patients with DoC, particularly in those who are minimally conscious. The extent to which this occurred was correlated with cerebral glucose uptake. The current findings emphasize the importance of excitatory thalamocortical activity in reestablishing normal brain rhythms after brain injury and show that biophysical modelling of the corticothalamic circuitry could help select patients who might be potentially receptive to treatment and undergo plasticity.

Neuroscience.title_cn: 意识障碍中新皮层活动恢复的个体轨迹
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 意识障碍 (DoC) 患者中，从紊乱的脑活动演变为生理性脑节律可能预示着恢复。因此，引人深思的问题随之出现：意识障碍患者中，与脑节律紊乱相关的病理生理学因素是什么？以及个体意识障碍患者是否存在恢复正常脑节律的潜在途径？我们利用基于脑电图 (EEG) 的生物物理模拟，在个体层面探讨了这些问题。主要发现是，无意识患者表现出兴奋性皮层-丘脑突触强度的丧失。在部分意识障碍患者，尤其是微意识状态患者中，这种兴奋性皮层-丘脑回路中的突触可塑性促进了生理性脑节律的恢复，其特征是频谱峰值的再现以及功率谱中非周期性 (1/f) 成分的平坦化。这种恢复的程度与脑葡萄糖摄取量相关。当前研究结果强调了兴奋性丘脑-皮层活动在脑损伤后重建正常脑节律中的重要性，并表明皮层-丘脑回路的生物物理建模有助于筛选可能对治疗有反应并经历可塑性变化的患者。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Multimodal learning enables chat-based exploration of single-cell data
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02857-9CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Single-cell sequencing characterizes biological samples at unprecedented scale and detail, but data interpretation remains challenging. Here, we present CellWhisperer, an artificial intelligence (AI) model and software tool for chat-based interrogation of gene expression. We establish a multimodal embedding of transcriptomes and their textual annotations, using contrastive learning on 1 million RNA sequencing profiles with AI-curated descriptions. This embedding informs a large language model that answers user-provided questions about cells and genes in natural-language chats. We benchmark CellWhisperer’s performance for zero-shot prediction of cell types and other biological annotations and demonstrate its use for biological discovery in a meta-analysis of human embryonic development. We integrate a CellWhisperer chat box with the CELLxGENE browser, allowing users to interactively explore gene expression through a combined graphical and chat interface. In summary, CellWhisperer leverages large community-scale data repositories to connect transcriptomes and text, thereby enabling interactive exploration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data with natural-language chats. Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 单细胞测序以前所未有的规模和细节表征生物样本，但数据解读仍然充满挑战。在此，我们介绍CellWhisperer，这是一种用于基因表达对话式查询的人工智能（AI）模型和软件工具。我们利用对比学习，基于100万个带有AI策展描述的RNA测序图谱，建立了转录组及其文本注释的多模态嵌入。该嵌入为大型语言模型提供信息，使其能够以自然语言对话的形式回答用户提出的关于细胞和基因的问题。我们对CellWhisperer在细胞类型和其他生物学注释的零样本预测性能进行了基准测试，并展示了其在人类胚胎发育元分析中进行生物学发现的应用。我们将CellWhisperer聊天框与CELLxGENE浏览器集成，使用户能够通过图形和聊天相结合的界面交互式探索基因表达。总之，CellWhisperer利用大型社区规模的数据存储库连接转录组和文本，从而通过自然语言对话实现单细胞RNA测序数据的交互式探索。CellWhisperer利用转录组和文本的多模态学习来回答有关单细胞RNA测序数据的问题。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Cellular and molecular mechanisms of seahorse male pregnancy
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02883-5Seahorses have a unique sex role reversal with male pregnancy involving the brood pouch, an evolutionarily novel organ. Single-cell & Spatial omics.authors_short: Liu, Yali et al., Lin, Qiang
Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 海马雄性妊娠的细胞和分子机制
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 海马及其近亲（海龙科鱼类）展现出独特的性别角色逆转现象。它们的雄性妊娠由一个进化上新颖的器官——育儿袋所促成，该育儿袋尽管起源于完全不同的组织，但其功能与哺乳动物的子宫和胎盘类似。本研究利用比较单细胞多组学和基因组学分析，探讨了海龙科鱼类进化过程中从产卵到妊娠的转变，并将其趋同进化的胎盘式亲代抚育生命史与哺乳动物进行了比较。体内实验表明，一群具有育儿袋诱导潜能并表达雄激素（而非其他胎生动物中的雌激素）的上皮祖细胞能够触发育儿袋的发生。两种机制确保了育儿袋的功能性：一是招募了以在哺乳动物子宫中也发现的直系同源基因表达为特征的假胎盘相关细胞；二是协同利用了特定细胞，用于将粘性卵附着在雄性特化的皮肤斑块上，这些斑块表达海马特有的新基因，如pastns和syn-凝集素。这些机制共同推动了海龙科鱼类育儿袋的多样性和复杂性。海马具有独特的性别角色逆转现象，其雄性妊娠涉及育儿袋这一进化上新颖的器官。本研究利用单细胞基因组学和体内实验揭示了海马育儿袋发育和多样性的细胞基础和分子机制。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02319-zLamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Here we used a suite of single-cell approaches, including integrated live-cell imaging of secretion and cell fate, flow cytometry and high-content imaging, to investigate IL-1β secretion dynamics in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated primary human peripheral blood CD14+ monocytes. We found marked heterogeneity: a large fraction of cells remained viable and contributed negligibly to IL-1β secretion, challenging established models. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 单细胞分析揭示细胞死亡是人单核细胞中NLRP3介导的IL-1β分泌的驱动力
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 白细胞介素-1β (IL-1β) 是一种关键的促炎细胞因子，在感染和炎症性疾病中发挥重要作用，但其从人单核细胞中释放的调控机制仍不清楚。本研究中，我们采用了一系列单细胞方法，包括分泌和细胞命运的整合活细胞成像、流式细胞术和高内涵成像，以研究脂多糖刺激的原代人外周血CD14+单核细胞中IL-1β的分泌动态。我们发现显著的异质性：大部分细胞保持活力，对IL-1β分泌的贡献微乎其微，这挑战了既有的模型。相反，一小部分（5-10%）经历经典NLRP3炎性体激活和GSDMD依赖性细胞焦亡的细胞产生了大部分分泌的IL-1β，而凋亡细胞向继发性坏死转变的贡献较小。对冷吡啉相关周期综合征患者CD14+单核细胞的单细胞分析证实，裂解性细胞死亡是病理性IL-1β释放的驱动力。这些发现将IL-1β重新定义为一种损伤相关分子模式，主要由垂死的单核细胞分泌。Lamkanfi、Shirasaki、Izawa及其同事的研究表明，在脂多糖刺激或携带NLRP3激活突变的人单核细胞中，IL-1β的释放主要局限于经历裂解性细胞死亡的细胞。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Universal consensus 3D segmentation of cells from 2D segmented stacks
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02887-wu-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Cell segmentation is the foundation of a wide range of microscopy-based biological studies. Deep learning has revolutionized two-dimensional (2D) cell segmentation, enabling generalized solutions across cell types and imaging modalities. This has been driven by the ease of scaling up image acquisition, annotation and computation. However, three-dimensional (3D) cell segmentation, requiring dense annotation of 2D slices, still poses substantial challenges. Manual labeling of 3D cells to train broadly applicable segmentation models is prohibitive. Even in high-contrast images annotation is ambiguous and time-consuming. Here we develop a theory and toolbox, u-Segment3D, for 2D-to-3D segmentation, compatible with any 2D method generating pixel-based instance cell masks. u-Segment3D translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data, as demonstrated on 11 real-life datasets, comprising >70,000 cells, spanning single cells, cell aggregates and tissue. Moreover, u-Segment3D is competitive with native 3D segmentation, even exceeding when cells are crowded and have complex morphologies. u-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.authors_short: Zhou, Felix Y. et al., Danuser, Gaudenz
Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 基于二维分割堆栈的细胞通用共识三维分割
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 细胞分割是广泛显微镜生物学研究的基础。深度学习彻底改变了二维（2D）细胞分割，实现了跨细胞类型和成像模式的通用解决方案。这得益于图像采集、标注和计算的规模化便利性。然而，三维（3D）细胞分割需要对2D切片进行密集标注，这仍然带来了巨大的挑战。手动标注3D细胞以训练广泛适用的分割模型是难以承受的。即使在高对比度图像中，标注也模糊不清且耗时。在此，我们开发了一种理论和工具箱u-Segment3D，用于2D到3D的分割，它兼容任何生成基于像素的实例细胞掩膜的2D方法。u-Segment3D无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割，这已在11个真实数据集（包含超过70,000个细胞，涵盖单细胞、细胞聚集体和组织）上得到验证。此外，u-Segment3D与原生3D分割方法相比具有竞争力，甚至在细胞拥挤且形态复杂时表现更优。u-Segment3D是一个通用框架，无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割。它在包括形态复杂细胞在内的各种数据集中表现良好。

Development.title: Reprogramming of H3K36me2 guides lineage-specific post-implantation de novo DNA methylation
Development.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01805-8Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Development.abstract: In mammals, DNA methylation is re-established after implantation following post-fertilization global erasure. Yet, the underlying mechanism remains elusive. Here we investigate H3K36me2 reprogramming in mouse early development and its role in post-implantation DNA methylation re-establishment. In oocytes, H3K36me2 accumulates in gene bodies upon transcription silencing and partially persists to the eight-cell stage. De novo H3K36me2 occurs at enhancers after zygotic genome activation, before spreading genome-wide after implantation, except on the inactive X chromosome. Mutation of the H3K36me2 methyltransferase NSD1 compromises global DNA methylation after implantation preferentially in extra-embryonic lineages and that at methylation-prone promoters, including those of germline-specific genes. However, DNA methylation establishment partially bypasses H3K36me2 through upregulated DNMT3B, a ‘leaky’ H3K36me2/3 reader. This contrasts with DNMT3A, which strictly requires H3K36me2/3 for DNA methylation through its PWWP domain. Finally, DNA methylation valleys escape de novo DNA methylation via PRC1/H2AK119ub1-mediated H3K36me2 exclusion. Thus, H3K36me2 reprogramming regulates lineage- and locus-specific post-implantation DNA methylation establishment. Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.

Development.title_cn: H3K36me2重编程引导谱系特异性着床后从头DNA甲基化
Development.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，DNA甲基化在受精后经历全局擦除，随后在着床后重新建立。然而，其潜在机制仍不清楚。本研究探讨了小鼠早期发育过程中H3K36me2的重编程及其在着床后DNA甲基化重建中的作用。在卵母细胞中，H3K36me2在转录沉默后在基因体中积累，并部分持续到八细胞阶段。在合子基因组激活后，从头H3K36me2在增强子处发生，随后在着床后扩散至全基因组，但失活的X染色体除外。H3K36me2甲基转移酶NSD1的突变会损害着床后的全局DNA甲基化，尤其是在胚外谱系和易于甲基化的启动子（包括生殖系特异性基因的启动子）上。然而，DNA甲基化的建立通过上调的DNMT3B（一种“泄漏的”H3K36me2/3读取器）部分绕过了H3K36me2。这与DNMT3A形成对比，DNMT3A通过其PWWP结构域严格依赖H3K36me2/3进行DNA甲基化。最后，DNA甲基化谷通过PRC1/H2AK119ub1介导的H3K36me2排斥作用逃避从头DNA甲基化。因此，H3K36me2重编程调控着谱系和位点特异性的着床后DNA甲基化建立。Lu、Wang等人描绘了从卵母细胞到胚胎转变、着床前和着床后早期发育过程中H3K36me2的图谱，并报告了H3K36me2在着床后胚胎中重建谱系特异性DNA甲基化中的作用。

Synthetic Biology.title: A parts list of promoters and gRNA scaffolds for mammalian genome engineering and molecular recording
Synthetic Biology.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02896-2Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.
Synthetic Biology.abstract: A standardized ‘parts list’ of sequences for genetic engineering of microbes has been indispensable to progress in synthetic biology, but few analogous parts exist for mammalian systems. Here we design libraries of extant, ancestral, mutagenized or miniaturized variants of polymerase III promoters and guide RNA (gRNA) scaffolds and quantify their abilities to mediate precise edits to the mammalian genome through multiplex prime editing. We identify thousands of parts for reproducible editing in human and mouse cell lines, including hundreds with greater activity than commonly used sequences. Saturation mutagenesis screens identify tolerated sequence variants that further enhance sequence diversity. In an application to molecular recording, we design a ‘ten key’ array that, in mammalian cells, achieves balanced activity of pegRNAs as predicted by the activity of the component parts. The data reported here will aid the design of synthetic loci encoding arrays of gRNAs exhibiting predictable, differentiated levels of activity for applications in multiplexed perturbation, biological recorders and complex genetic circuits. Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.
